characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: Letting Down Her Hair
characters.author: Clio Wolfensberger
characters.flavor_text: Who are you? And how did you find me?
characters.rules_text: TANGLE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Injured Soldier
characters.author: Jared Mathews
characters.flavor_text: She’ll never give up.
characters.rules_text: BATTLE WOUND This character enters play with 2 damage.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Elite Archer
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) STRAIGHT SHOOTER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3 this turn. TRIPLE SHOT During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

characters.name: Raya
characters.subtitle: Headstrong
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.flavor_text: Two parts bravery, one part cleverness, and a whole lot of determination.
characters.rules_text: NOTE TO SELF, DON'T DIE During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. If you do, she can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Sergeant Tibbs
characters.subtitle: Courageous Cat
characters.author: Cory Godbey
characters.flavor_text: Yes, sir. Righto, sir. Right away, sir!

characters.name: Tuk Tuk
characters.subtitle: Lively Partner
characters.author: Sandra Rios
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ON A ROLL When you play this character, you may move him and one of your other characters to the same location for free. If you do, the other character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: True-Hearted
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Make sure you know what’s truly important and be willing to fight for it.
characters.rules_text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Huey
characters.subtitle: Savvy Nephew
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: This looks like part of a larger crystal!
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) THREE NEPHEWS Whenever this character quests, if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play, you may draw 3 cards.

characters.name: Dewey
characters.subtitle: Showy Nephew
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Louie
characters.subtitle: Chill Nephew
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: Found the last one!
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Accidentally Adrift
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.rules_text: WASHED AWAY When you play this character, you may put chosen item into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted. MAKING WAVES Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 this turn.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Considerate Diplomat
characters.author: LadyShalirin
characters.rules_text: IMPERIAL INVITATION Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Princess character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Cruella De Vil
characters.subtitle: Style Icon
characters.author: Juan Diego León
characters.rules_text: OUT OF SEASON Once during your turn, whenever a character with cost 2 or less is banished, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted. INSULTING REMARK During your turn, each opposing character with cost 2 or less gets -1.

characters.name: Mufasa
characters.subtitle: King of the Pride Lands
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size.

characters.name: Cruella De Vil
characters.subtitle: Fashionable Cruiser
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.flavor_text: Isn’t it just gorgeous, darling? And just as stylish as I am.
characters.rules_text: NOW GET GOING During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Braving the Storm
characters.author: Maria Dresden
characters.flavor_text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.
characters.rules_text: I WAS BORN READY While you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Flounder
characters.subtitle: Voice of Reason
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Excitement. . . adventure. . . danger lurking around every cor— AAAAAGGH!

characters.name: Hans
characters.subtitle: Noble Scoundrel
characters.author: Dustin Panzino / Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula—all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.
characters.rules_text: ROYAL SCHEMES When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Mirror Seeker
characters.author: Jennifer Gheduzzi / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: She has only one question, and she’d better like the answer.
characters.rules_text: CALCULATING AND VAIN Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

characters.name: Grand Pabbie
characters.subtitle: Oldest and Wisest
characters.author: Juan Diego León
characters.flavor_text: When he talks, even the sky listens.
characters.rules_text: ANCIENT INSIGHT Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Hades
characters.subtitle: Infernal Schemer
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.flavor_text: He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness.
characters.rules_text: IS THERE A DOWNSIDE TO THIS? When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.

characters.name: Mama Odie
characters.subtitle: Mystical Maven
characters.author: Rogie Custodio / Erin Shin
characters.flavor_text: You dig a little deeper, you’ll find everything you need.
characters.rules_text: THIS GOING TO BE GOOD Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Dreaming Guardian
characters.author: Nicholas Kole
characters.flavor_text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) PROTECTIVE EMBRACE Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Tranquil Princess
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: Her music fills the Illuminary’s gardens with joy and light.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Heir of Agrabah
characters.author: Rosa la Barbera / Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: She may be young, but she’s got the spirit of a true leader.
characters.rules_text: I'M A FAST LEARNER When you play this character, remove up to 1 damage from chosen character of yours.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Inventive Engineer
characters.author: Gabriel Romero / Pix Smith
characters.flavor_text: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.
characters.rules_text: TINKER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 less for the next item you play this turn.

characters.name: Judy Hopps
characters.subtitle: Optimistic Officer
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.flavor_text: I’ll get to the bottom of what happened with the locked lorebook. You can count on me!
characters.rules_text: DON'T CALL ME CUTE When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. If you do, its player draws a card.

characters.name: Maid Marian
characters.subtitle: Delightful Dreamer
characters.author: Jenna Gray
characters.flavor_text: She makes every space more beautiful.
characters.rules_text: HIGHBORN LADY When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 this turn.

characters.name: Winnie the Pooh
characters.subtitle: Having a Think
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: When he thought, he thought in the most thoughtful way he could think.
characters.rules_text: HUNNY POT Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Growing Girl
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: GOOD ADVICE Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) WHAT DID I DO? While this character has 10 or more, she gets +4.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Regal Princess
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Unrivaled Archer
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it.
characters.rules_text: FEED THE POOR When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card. GOOD SHOT During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Philoctetes
characters.subtitle: No-Nonsense Instructor
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: YOU GOTTA STAY FOCUSED Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 while challenging.) SHAMELESS PROMOTER Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Trumpeter
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.rules_text: SOUND THE CALL , 2 — Play a character for free.

characters.name: Nala
characters.subtitle: Undaunted Lioness
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.rules_text: DETERMINED DIVERSION While this character has no damage, she gets +1 and gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Lilo
characters.subtitle: Best Explorer Ever
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.rules_text: COME ON, PEOPLE, LET'S MOVE When you play this character, your other characters gain Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.) GO GET 'EM Whenever this character quests, chosen Alien character gains Challenger +2 and "This character can challenge ready characters" this turn.

characters.name: Scar
characters.subtitle: Finally King
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.rules_text: BE GRATEFUL Your Ally characters get +1. STICK WITH ME At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may draw cards equal to the of chosen Ally character of yours. If you do, choose and discard 2 cards and banish that character.

characters.name: Little John
characters.subtitle: Sir Reginald
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: WHAT A BEAUTIFUL BRAWL! When you play this character, choose one: • Chosen Hero character gains Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.) • Deal 2 damage to chosen Villain character.

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Champion of Sherwood
characters.author: Rudy Hill
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.) SKILLED COMBATANT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore. THE GOOD OF OTHERS When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Fearless Princess
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: TAKE THE LEAP During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.) NOW'S MY CHANCE Choose and discard a card — This character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 while challenging.)

characters.name: Tiana
characters.subtitle: Diligent Waitress
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: <My> place is going to be special, with great food to fill people’s bellies and hot jazz to feed their souls!

characters.name: Benja
characters.subtitle: Guardian of the Dragon Gem
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.flavor_text: Don’t mistake spirit for skill.
characters.rules_text: WE HAVE A CHOICE When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Royal Vizier
characters.author: Rob Di Salvo
characters.flavor_text: Soon you’ll learn who holds the <real> power!
characters.rules_text: I DON'T TRUST HIM, SIRE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Prince Naveen
characters.subtitle: Penniless Royal
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: All he's got is his charm.

characters.name: Eeyore
characters.subtitle: Overstuffed Donkey
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: Not much of a roadblock, but I suppose I’ll do.
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Capable Fighter
characters.author: Noukah
characters.flavor_text: Capable? You don’t know the half of it. —Little John
characters.rules_text: SKIRMISH — Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Standard Bearer
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: He sets the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.
characters.rules_text: STAND STRONG When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: Beloved Hero
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Lawrence
characters.subtitle: Jealous Manservant
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: In this new world, the crown could finally be his.
characters.rules_text: PAYBACK While this character has no damage, he gets +4.

characters.name: Tinker Bell
characters.subtitle: Giant Fairy
characters.author: Cookie
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.) ROCK THE BOAT When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character. PUNY PIRATE! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Tinker Bell
characters.subtitle: Tiny Tactician
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.flavor_text: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.
characters.rules_text: BATTLE PLANS — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: Captain of the Jolly Roger
characters.author: Adrianne Gumaya
characters.flavor_text: A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We’ll pot ’em like sitting ducks.
characters.rules_text: DOUBLE THE POWDER! When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: True Hero
characters.author: Marcel Berg
characters.flavor_text: You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic.
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: John Silver
characters.subtitle: Greedy Treasure Seeker
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: The eighth Rule of Villainy: Don't underestimate the power of a bad reputation.
characters.rules_text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Li Shang
characters.subtitle: Imperial Captain
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.flavor_text: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon—the Empire's finest warrior.

characters.name: Prince Eric
characters.subtitle: Dashing and Brave
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: I lost her once! I'm not gonna lose her again!
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Sonic Warrior
characters.author: Marcel Berg
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.) AMPLIFIED VOICE Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2 to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Determined Mermaid
characters.author: Dylan Bonner
characters.flavor_text: Everything she’s ever wanted is almost in reach.
characters.rules_text: I WANT MORE Whenever you play a song, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Conceited Ruler
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) ROYAL SUMMONS At the start of your turn, you may choose and discard a Princess or Queen character card to return a character card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Holding Court
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: The other princesses were especially happy to attend her long-awaited celebration.
characters.rules_text: ROYAL WELCOME Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 less for the next Princess or Queen character you play this turn.

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Alien Dancer
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.flavor_text: Moving to the music, he begins to understand the true meaning of ohana and how he fits into the family he has found.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Sea Witch
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: The secret contract has already been written.
characters.rules_text: YOU'RE TOO LATE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Wanted Llama
characters.author: Michaela Martin
characters.flavor_text: So there I was. Perfectly in control of the situation.
characters.rules_text: OK, WHERE AM I? When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Elsa
characters.subtitle: Snow Queen
characters.author: Nicholas Kole
characters.flavor_text: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an entirely new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.
characters.rules_text: FREEZE — Exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Set for Adventure
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.rules_text: FAMILY VACATION Once during your turn, whenever this character moves to a location, you may move one of your other characters to that location for free. If you do, draw a card.

characters.name: Pegasus
characters.subtitle: Gift for Hercules
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: His name is Pegasus. And he’s all yours.... —Zeus
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Max Goof
characters.subtitle: Rockin' Teen
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) I JUST WANNA STAY HOME This character can't move to locations.

characters.flavor_text: For the first time ever, we’re seeing it eye to eye.

characters.flavor_text: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.
characters.rules_text: DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

characters.name: Maleficent
characters.subtitle: Monstrous Dragon
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

characters.name: Cursed Merfolk
characters.subtitle: Ursula's Handiwork
characters.author: Massimiliano Narciso / Marieke Ferrari
characters.flavor_text: Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price... —Ursula
characters.rules_text: POOR SOULS Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Sisu
characters.subtitle: Daring Visitor
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.flavor_text: Come on—what's the worst that can happen?
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) BRING ON THE HEAT! When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 1 or less.

characters.name: Louie
characters.subtitle: One Cool Duck
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: The snakes are cool, I guess. Pretty standard trap, though.
characters.rules_text: SPRING THE TRAP While this character is being challenged, the challenging character gets -1.

characters.name: Dewey
characters.subtitle: Lovable Showoff
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: Snakes? Firing lasers? In a secret underground lair? No problem!

characters.name: Huey
characters.subtitle: Reliable Leader
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: Forget the magical snakes. There's the way out of the trap!
characters.rules_text: I KNOW THE WAY Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 less for the next character you play this turn.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Groundbreaking Chef
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: You're just in time for Surprise à la Goof!
characters.rules_text: PLENTY TO GO AROUND At the end of your turn, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your other characters. Ready each character you removed damage from this way.

characters.name: Antonio Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Friend to All
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.rules_text: OF COURSE THEY CAN COME Once during your turn, whenever one of your characters sings a song, you may search your deck for a character card with cost 3 or less and reveal that card to all players. Put that card into your hand and shuffle your deck.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Daring Defender
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) TRUE VALOR This character gets +1 for each 1 damage on her.

characters.name: Ludwig Von Drake
characters.subtitle: All-Around Expert
characters.author: Pietro B. Zemelo
characters.rules_text: SUPERIOR MIND When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice. LASTING LEGACY When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Charlotte La Bouff
characters.subtitle: Mardi Gras Princess
characters.author: Emily Abeydeera
characters.flavor_text: Seems like only yesterday we were both little girls dreaming our fairy tale dreams, and tonight they’re finally coming true.

characters.name: Tiana
characters.subtitle: Natural Talent
characters.author: Milica Celikovic
characters.rules_text: Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.) CAPTIVATING MELODY Whenever you play a song, each opposing character gets -1 until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Mirabel Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Curious Child
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.flavor_text: Whatever gift awaits will be just as special as you. —Alma Madrigal
characters.rules_text: YOU ARE A WONDER When you play this character, you may reveal a song card in your hand to gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Family Dog
characters.author: Erika Wiseman
characters.flavor_text: She's happiest in the company of those she loves.
characters.rules_text: SOMEONE TO CARE FOR When you play this character, you may play a character with cost 2 or less for free.

characters.name: Jim Dear
characters.subtitle: Beloved Husband
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: Family is family no matter what.
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Gene
characters.subtitle: Niceland Resident
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: Getting a medal feels pretty great. Making Gene squirm feels even better. —Wreck-It Ralph
characters.rules_text: I GUESS YOU EARNED THIS Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Perdita
characters.subtitle: On the Lookout
characters.author: Carmine Pucci
characters.flavor_text: Where did the forest go? Stay close, my darlings. Something's amiss here. —Perdita
characters.rules_text: KEEPING WATCH While you have a Puppy character in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Rhino
characters.subtitle: One-Sixteenth Wolf
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: I eat danger for breakfast.
characters.rules_text: TINY HOWL When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Darling Dear
characters.subtitle: Beloved Wife
characters.author: Jake Murphy
characters.flavor_text: I don't imagine anything could ever take her place in our hearts.
characters.rules_text: HOW SWEET When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: The Colonel
characters.subtitle: Old Sheepdog
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: His training was invaluable in infiltrating the palace.
characters.rules_text: WE'VE GOT 'EM OUTNUMBERED While you have 3 or more Puppy characters in play, this character gets +2 and +2.

characters.name: Chief Bogo
characters.subtitle: Commanding Officer
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: SENDING BACKUP During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card with cost 5 or less, you may play that character for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Pua
characters.subtitle: Protective Pig
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) FREE FRUIT When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Bruno Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Singing Seer
characters.author: Milica Celikovic
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Bruno Madrigal.) BRIGHT FUTURE Whenever this character sings a song, you may draw a card for each character you have in play.

characters.name: Kaa
characters.subtitle: Hypnotizing Python
characters.author: Francesco D'ippolito / Malia Ewart
characters.flavor_text: You have just made a s-serious mis-sstake, my friend.
characters.rules_text: LOOK ME IN THE EYE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 and gains Reckless until the start of your next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Tramp
characters.subtitle: Dapper Rascal
characters.author: Erika Wiseman
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Tramp.) PLAY IT COOL During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your characters is banished, you may draw a card.

characters.name: King Candy
characters.subtitle: Sugar Rush Nightmare
characters.author: Joseph Buenning
characters.rules_text: A NEW ROSTER When this character is banished, you may return another Racer character card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Big Lug
characters.author: Javi Salas
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Wreck-It Ralph.) BACK ON TRACK When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return a Racer character card with cost 6 or less from your discard to your hand. If you do, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Patch
characters.subtitle: Playful Pup
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.flavor_text: Sand sure was more fun than it looked!
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) PUPPY BARKING While you have another Puppy character in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Rolly
characters.subtitle: Chubby Puppy
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) ADORABLE ANTICS When you play this character, you may put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Perdita
characters.subtitle: Determined Mother
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Perdita.) QUICK, EVERYONE HIDE When you play this character, you may put all Puppy character cards from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.subtitle: Tried and True
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.rules_text: HAPPY HELPER While this character has no damage, he gets +2 and gains Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Bolt
characters.subtitle: Down but Not Out
characters.author: Joy Ang / Jaime Puga
characters.flavor_text: The only power you need is the power of AWESOMENESS! —Rhino
characters.rules_text: NONE OF YOUR POWERS ARE WORKING This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Rhino
characters.subtitle: Power Hamster
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Rhino.) EPIC BALL OF AWESOME While this character has no damage, he gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

characters.name: Antonio's Jaguar
characters.subtitle: Faithful Companion
characters.author: Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: He knows the way through. Just try to keep up! —Antonio
characters.rules_text: YOU WANT TO GO WHERE? When you play this character, if you have a character named Antonio Madrigal in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Calhoun
characters.subtitle: Hard-Nosed Leader
characters.author: Edu Francisco / Amanda Duarte
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) LOOT DROP When this character is banished, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Decisive Dog
characters.author: Therese Vildefall
characters.rules_text: PACK OF HER OWN Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 this turn. TAKE THE LEAD While this character has 3 or more, she gets +2.

characters.name: Alma Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Accepting Grandmother
characters.author: Simone Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: I’m sorry I held on too tight.
characters.rules_text: THE MIRACLE IS YOU Once during your turn, whenever one or more of your characters sings a song, you may ready those characters.

characters.name: Clawhauser
characters.subtitle: Front Desk Officer
characters.author: Denny Minonne
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

characters.name: Joey
characters.subtitle: Blue Pigeon
characters.author: French Carlomagno
characters.flavor_text: If you need fixin’, ol' Joey’s on the job.
characters.rules_text: I'VE GOT JUST THE THING Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters with Bodyguard.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Coin Collector
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.rules_text: HERE, PIGGY, PIGGY For each item named The Nephews' Piggy Bank you have in play, you pay 2 less to play this character. MONEY EVERYWHERE When you play this character, your other characters gain " — Draw a card" this turn.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Gwawi
characters.flavor_text: Oh boy! A new friend to play with!
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Palace Guard
characters.subtitle: Spectral Sentry
characters.author: Eva Widermann
characters.flavor_text: All of the power of the normal guards, with none of the insolence. —Jafar
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)

characters.name: Druun
characters.subtitle: Ravenous Plague
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.flavor_text: They’ve always been here. Waiting for a moment of weakness to attack. —Sisu
characters.rules_text: Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4.)

characters.name: Madame Medusa
characters.subtitle: Deceiving Partner
characters.author: Heidi Neunhoffer
characters.rules_text: DOUBLE-CROSS When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to return chosen character with cost 2 or less to their player’s hand.

characters.name: Hades
characters.subtitle: Ruthless Tyrant
characters.author: Marcel Berg
characters.flavor_text: Don't forget—I'm the guy with the leverage here.
characters.rules_text: SHORT ON PATIENCE When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to draw 2 cards.

characters.name: Lena Sabrewing
characters.subtitle: Pure Energy
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SUPERNATURAL VENGEANCE — Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Abu
characters.subtitle: Illusory Pachyderm
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.) GRASPING TRUNK Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the of chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Bruno Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Single-Minded
characters.author: Natalia Trykowska
characters.flavor_text: I’m not in the vision business right now. I’m in the stopping you business.
characters.rules_text: STANDING TALL When you play this character, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Royal Guard
characters.subtitle: Octopus Soldier
characters.author: Rachel Elese
characters.rules_text: HEAVILY ARMED Whenever you draw a card, this character gains Challenger +1 this turn. (They get +1 while challenging.)

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Bored Royal
characters.author: Rachel Elese
characters.flavor_text: Wait'll they get a whiff of this . . .
characters.rules_text: LLAMA BREATH When you play this character, you may return chosen character, item, or location with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

characters.name: Megara
characters.subtitle: Part of the Plan
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: The sooner we get this done, the sooner I'm free . . . of you.
characters.rules_text: CONTENTIOUS ALLIANCE While you have a character named Hades in play, this character gains Challenger +2. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Yelana
characters.subtitle: Northuldra Leader
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.rules_text: WE ONLY TRUST NATURE When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Ryder
characters.subtitle: Fleet-Footed Infiltrator
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.flavor_text: Sheesh, what is it with this high sultan guy? Can't he put in stairs like a normal person?
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Bambi
characters.subtitle: Prince of the Forest
characters.author: Heidi Neunhoffer
characters.flavor_text: As he grew older, he began to understand his responsibilities to all the creatures of the woods.

characters.name: Poe De Spell
characters.subtitle: Magica's Brother
characters.author: Kamil Murzyn
characters.flavor_text: Sister, dear, if we turn all the townspeople into frogs, who will give us our gold and turnips?

characters.name: Madam Mim
characters.subtitle: Up to No Good
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.flavor_text: They think they know my tricks... Oh, this one’s going to be marvelously malicious!

characters.name: Elsa
characters.subtitle: Fierce Protector
characters.author: Hedvig H-S
characters.flavor_text: I have to protect my sister. You're not going anywhere!
characters.rules_text: ICE OVER 1 , Choose and discard a card — Exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Strings Attached
characters.author: Hedvig H-S
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) GOT TO KEEP REAL QUIET Once during your turn, whenever you ready this character, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Jiminy Cricket
characters.subtitle: Level-Headed and Wise
characters.author: Rosa la Barbera / Livio Cacciatore
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ENOUGH'S ENOUGH While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Rush enter play exerted.

characters.name: Bambi
characters.subtitle: Little Prince
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.rules_text: SAY HELLO When you play this character, gain 1 lore. KIND OF BASHFUL When an opponent plays a character, return this character to your hand.

characters.name: Monstro
characters.subtitle: Infamous Whale
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) FULL BREACH Choose and discard a card — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Nero
characters.subtitle: Fearsome Crocodile
characters.author: Teresita Q. / SCG
characters.flavor_text: He's identical to Brutus in temperament and toothiness.
characters.rules_text: AND MEAN — Move 1 damage counter from this character to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Magica De Spell
characters.subtitle: Shadow Form
characters.author: Sandara Tang
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) DANCE OF DARKNESS When you play this character, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to draw a card.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Impulsive Llama
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Kuzco.) WHAT DOES THIS DO? When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. Then, each opponent may draw a card.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: On Edge
characters.author: Julien Vandois
characters.rules_text: WHY DO WE EVEN HAVE THAT LEVER? When you play this character, if you have a card named Pull the Lever! in your discard, you may search your deck for a card named Wrong Lever! and reveal that card to all players. Put that card into your hand and shuffle your deck.

characters.name: Madam Mim
characters.subtitle: Rhino
characters.author: Alibeth Zermeno
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Madam Mim.) MAKE WAY, COMING THROUGH! When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.

characters.name: Mother Gothel
characters.subtitle: Knows What's Best
characters.author: Joel DuQue
characters.rules_text: LOOK WHAT YOU'VE DONE When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to give that character Challenger +1 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +1 while challenging.)

characters.name: Blue Fairy
characters.subtitle: Guiding Light
characters.author: Mané Kandalyan Manderson
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Magical Mission
characters.author: Luigi Aimè
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Anna.) Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) COORDINATED PLAN Whenever this character quests, if you have a character named Elsa in play, you may draw a card.

characters.name: The Sultan
characters.subtitle: Royal Apparition
characters.author: Max Ulichney
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.) COMMANDING PRESENCE Whenever one of your Illusion characters quests, exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: High Sultan of Lorcana
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: DARK POWER Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card. If an Illusion character card is discarded this way, you may play that character for free.

characters.name: Camilo Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Center Stage
characters.author: Carlos Gomes Cabral
characters.flavor_text: My primo Camilo won’t stop until he makes you smile today. —Mirabel
characters.rules_text: ENCORE! ENCORE! When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

characters.name: Flower
characters.subtitle: Shy Skunk
characters.author: Sandra Rios
characters.flavor_text: His sweet nature outmatches all the blooms in the meadow.
characters.rules_text: LOOKING FOR FRIENDS Whenever you play another character, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Wilhelmina Packard
characters.subtitle: The Radio Operator
characters.author: Aurélie Lise-Anne
characters.flavor_text: Helga: Sounds metallic. Could be an echo off one of the rocks. Wilhelmina: Do you want to do my job? Be my guest.

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Undercover Detective
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: INCAPACITATE When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand. INTERFERE Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent discards a card at random.

characters.name: Tramp
characters.subtitle: Observant Guardian
characters.author: Edu Francisco
characters.flavor_text: One glance at the tiny tracks, and his protective instincts kicked in.
characters.rules_text: HOW DO I GET IN? When you play this character, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Chaca
characters.subtitle: Junior Chipmunk
characters.author: Florencia Vazquez
characters.rules_text: IN CAHOOTS When you play this character, if you have a character named Tipo in play, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Tipo
characters.subtitle: Junior Chipmunk
characters.author: Florencia Vazquez
characters.flavor_text: This is so much fun, Chaca! I want to go higher!
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Bill the Lizard
characters.subtitle: Chimney Sweep
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: We need a lazard with a lizard! —White Rabbit
characters.rules_text: NOTHING TO IT While another character in play has damage, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: March Hare
characters.subtitle: Hare-Brained Eccentric
characters.author: Dustin Panzino
characters.flavor_text: He really knows how to light up a room.
characters.rules_text: LIGHT THE CANDLES When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

characters.name: Fred
characters.subtitle: Major Science Enthusiast
characters.author: Jared Nickerl / Patri Balanovsky
characters.flavor_text: Don’t be alarmed. It is just a suit. This is not my real face and body.
characters.rules_text: SPITTING FIRE! When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

characters.name: Mad Dog
characters.subtitle: Karnage's First Mate
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: He certainly isn't the brains of the operation.
characters.rules_text: ARE YOU SURE THIS IS SAFE, CAPTAIN? If you have a character named Don Karnage in play, you pay 1 less to play this character.

characters.name: Dale
characters.subtitle: Bumbler
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.flavor_text: You’re the fearless copilot who can handle any job.... Did I say fearless? I meant brainless! —Chip

characters.name: Louis
characters.subtitle: Endearing Alligator
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: SENSITIVE SOUL This character enters play exerted. FRIENDLIER THAN HE LOOKS When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Napoleon
characters.subtitle: Clever Bloodhound
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: Everyone knows that without rations, an operation'll be a failure. And this is why I outrank you, Lafayette. 'Cause I see the big picture.

characters.name: Chip
characters.subtitle: Quick Thinker
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Don't worry, Dale! I've got you!
characters.rules_text: I’LL HANDLE THIS When you play this character, chosen opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Fred
characters.subtitle: Giant-Sized
characters.author: Jules Dubost
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Fred.) I LIKE WHERE THIS IS HEADING Whenever this character quests, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Floodborn character card. Put that card into your hand and shuffle the rest into your deck.

characters.name: Gadget Hackwrench
characters.subtitle: Quirky Scientist
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.flavor_text: The scarab's power source! I knew that if I dug around I'd find it!
characters.rules_text: GOLLY! When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Raya
characters.subtitle: Infiltration Expert
characters.author: Dustin Panzino
characters.rules_text: UNCONVENTIONAL TACTICS Whenever this character quests, you may pay 2 to ready another chosen character.

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: High Climber
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WRAPPED UP Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

characters.name: Flynn Rider
characters.subtitle: Breaking and Entering
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: One way or another, I get what I want.
characters.rules_text: THIS IS A VERY BIG DAY Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player may choose and discard a card. If they don't, you gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Dormouse
characters.subtitle: Easily Agitated
characters.author: Joel DuQue
characters.flavor_text: The tea is strong, even if he isn’t.
characters.rules_text: VERY RUDE INDEED When you play this character, you may put 1 damage counter on chosen character.

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Clumsy as Can Be
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Alice.) ACCIDENT PRONE Whenever this character quests, put 1 damage counter on each other character.

characters.name: Queen of Hearts
characters.subtitle: Haughty Monarch
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: She’ll go wherever she pleases, no matter who she has to step on to get there.
characters.rules_text: COUNT OFF! While there are 5 or more characters with damage in play, this character gets +3.

characters.name: Hiro Hamada
characters.subtitle: Intuitive Thinker
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.rules_text: LOOK FOR A NEW ANGLE — Ready chosen Floodborn character.

characters.name: Go Go Tomago
characters.subtitle: Cutting Edge
characters.author: Beno Meli
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Go Go Tomago.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)  ZERO RESISTANCE When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Don Karnage
characters.subtitle: Air Pirate Leader
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SCORNFUL TAUNT Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: The Pirate King
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) GIVE ’EM ALL YOU GOT! Once during your turn, whenever an opposing character is damaged, your Pirate characters get +2 and gain Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

characters.name: Maui
characters.subtitle: Stubborn Trickster
characters.author: Natalie Dombois
characters.rules_text: I'M NOT FINISHED YET When this character is banished, choose one: • Put 2 damage counters on all opposing characters. • Banish all opposing items. • Banish all opposing locations.

characters.name: Honey Lemon
characters.subtitle: Costumed Catalyst
characters.author: Adam Ford
characters.rules_text: LET'S DO THIS! Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

characters.name: Jock
characters.subtitle: Attentive Uncle
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.flavor_text: Settle in, ye wee pups, and let Uncle Jock tell ye a story about some Illumineers and a mad adventure...
characters.rules_text: VOICE OF EXPERIENCE When you play this character, if you have 3 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Archimedes
characters.subtitle: Resourceful Owl
characters.author: Gwawi
characters.rules_text: YOU DON'T NEED THAT When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. NOW, THAT'S NOT BAD During your turn, whenever an item is banished, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Gloyd Orangeboar
characters.subtitle: Fierce Competitor
characters.author: Rudy Hill / Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: I’ve got tricks for my opponents <and> treats for my fans!
characters.rules_text: PUMPKIN SPICE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Honest John
characters.subtitle: Shameless Schemer
characters.author: Valentina Graziuso
characters.flavor_text: Say, jewels just lying around in a fancy joint like this? It would be a shame if a few went missing...

characters.name: Gyro Gearloose
characters.subtitle: Eccentric Inventor
characters.author: Pietro B. Zemelo
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) I'LL SHOW YOU! When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -3 this turn.

characters.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz
characters.subtitle: Spunky Speedster
characters.author: French Carlomagno
characters.flavor_text: I can handle anything you throw at me... Wait, are those <laser snakes>? This is the best track ever!
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Brutus
characters.subtitle: Fearsome Crocodile
characters.author: Teresita Q. / SCG
characters.flavor_text: He's identical to Nero in cruelty and classiness.
characters.rules_text: SPITEFUL During your turn, when this character is banished, if one of your characters was damaged this turn, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: The Dodo
characters.subtitle: Outlandish Storyteller
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: And there I was in the cave below the palace when suddenly sand began pouring down. Did I stop? No! What's a little sand?
characters.rules_text: EXTRAORDINARY SITUATION This character gets +1 for each 1 damage on him.

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Courageous Keyholder
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: Goodness, those scarabs are awfully close! We must find the way out!
characters.rules_text: THIS WAY OUT When you play this character, you may ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Lumiere
characters.subtitle: Nimble Candelabra
characters.author: Heidi Neunhoffer
characters.flavor_text: Sacrebleu! This is no way to treat a guest in your palace!
characters.rules_text: QUICK-STEP While you have an item card in your discard, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: Gaston
characters.subtitle: Arrogant Showoff
characters.author: Samoldstoree
characters.flavor_text: Take this magical stone. You'll need it to keep up with me!
characters.rules_text: BREAK APART When you play this character, you may banish one of your items to give chosen character +2 this turn.

characters.name: Mushu
characters.subtitle: Fast-Talking Dragon
characters.author: Kuya Jaypi
characters.flavor_text: Move, move, move! There’s no time to explain. Well, maybe a little time, so listen up...
characters.rules_text: LET'S GET THIS SHOW ON THE ROAD — Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Cri-Kee
characters.subtitle: Part of the Team
characters.author: Yu Nguyen
characters.flavor_text: You were so focused on me and Mulan that you forgot about my man Cri-Kee here. And that was a <mistake>! —Mushu
characters.rules_text: AT HER SIDE While you have 2 or more other exerted characters in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Lafayette
characters.subtitle: Sleepy Basset Hound
characters.author: Sara Leal (Loyal)
characters.flavor_text: What are we guarding the kitchen for, Napoleon? There ain't no scarabs 'round here. Call me when there's somethin' serious that needs fixin'.

characters.name: Figaro
characters.subtitle: Tuxedo Cat
characters.author: Saulo Nate
characters.flavor_text: Say hello to Figaro. Up to mischief already! —Geppetto
characters.rules_text: PLAYFULNESS Opposing items enter play exerted.

characters.name: Thumper
characters.subtitle: Young Bunny
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.flavor_text: C'mon! Let's show that mean old high sultan what’s what.
characters.rules_text: YOU CAN DO IT! — Chosen character gets +3 this turn.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Back Seat Driver
characters.author: Joseph Buenning
characters.flavor_text: Let's burn rubber, kid! —Wreck-It Ralph
characters.rules_text: CHARGED UP When you play this character, chosen Racer character gets +4 this turn.

characters.name: Tinker Bell
characters.subtitle: Insistent Fairy
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) PAY ATTENTION Whenever you play a character with 5 or more, you may exert them to gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Lilo
characters.subtitle: Causing an Uproar
characters.author: Julien Vandois
characters.rules_text: STOMPIN' TIME! During your turn, if you've played 3 or more actions this turn, you may play this character for free. RAAAWR! When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: LeFou
characters.subtitle: Cake Thief
characters.author: Simone Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: LeFou, sometimes you really take the cake. —Gaston
characters.rules_text: ALL FOR ME , Banish one of your items — Chosen opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Lumiere
characters.subtitle: Fired Up
characters.author: Justin Runfola
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Lumiere.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SACREBLEU! Whenever one of your items is banished, this character gets +1 this turn.

characters.name: The Coachman
characters.subtitle: Greedy Deceiver
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.rules_text: WILD RIDE While 2 or more characters of yours are exerted, this character gets +2 and gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Charging Ahead
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.rules_text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.) LONG RANGE This character can challenge ready characters.

characters.name: Mushu
characters.subtitle: Your Worst Nightmare
characters.author: Jared Mathews
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mushu.) ALL FIRED UP Whenever you play another character, they gain Rush, Reckless, and Evasive this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played. They can't quest and must challenge if able. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Mr. Snoops
characters.subtitle: Betrayed Partner
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.flavor_text: You can't do this to me, you swindler! We had a verbal agreement!
characters.rules_text: DOUBLE-CROSSING CROOK! During your turn, when this character is banished, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Friend Owl
characters.subtitle: Cantankerous Neighbor
characters.author: James Rey Sanchez
characters.flavor_text: Sand? In the forest? I’ll bet some magical miscreant’s up to no good. Well, it’s none of my concern. I’m going back to bed.

characters.name: Faline
characters.subtitle: Playful Fawn
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) PRECOCIOUS FRIEND While you have a character in play with more than each opposing character, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Prince John
characters.subtitle: Fraidy-Cat
characters.author: Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: Even a frightened lion still has claws.
characters.rules_text: HELP! HELP! Whenever an opponent plays a character, deal 1 damage to this character.

characters.name: The Mouse Queen
characters.subtitle: Ruler of Mousedom
characters.author: Jon Densk / Hayley Evans
characters.flavor_text: After that dreadful Ratigan business, I know about villains. This Jafar is certainly a villain of the highest order.

characters.name: Sir Pellinore
characters.subtitle: Seasoned Knight
characters.author: Rudy Hill
characters.flavor_text: Together, lads, we prevail!
characters.rules_text: CODE OF HONOR Whenever this character quests, your other characters gain Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Anita Radcliffe
characters.subtitle: Dog Lover
characters.author: Carmine Pucci
characters.rules_text: I'LL TAKE CARE OF YOU When you play this character, you may give chosen Puppy character Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Olaf
characters.subtitle: Recapping the Story
characters.author: Matt Chapman
characters.flavor_text: It began with two sisters. One born with magical powers, and one born powerless. Their love of snowmen, infinite.
characters.rules_text: ENDLESS TALE When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 this turn.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Trusting Sister
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.rules_text: WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Wasabi
characters.subtitle: Always Prepared
characters.author: Jules Dubost
characters.flavor_text: Okay, so the plan is ‘leave Wasabi to watch our backs while we steal the crown.' Good to know.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Go Go Tomago
characters.subtitle: Mechanical Engineer
characters.author: Jennifer Wu
characters.flavor_text: Check it out! This ‘ink’ offers so many possibilities.
characters.rules_text: NEED THIS! When you play a Floodborn character on this card, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: The Wardrobe
characters.subtitle: Perceptive Friend
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.flavor_text: Time to try something new, dear.
characters.rules_text: I HAVE JUST THE THING! , Choose and discard an item card — Draw 2 cards.

characters.name: Mrs. Potts
characters.subtitle: Head Housekeeper
characters.author: Julie Vu
characters.flavor_text: Now, don't fret over the mess, love. We'll have everything shipshape in no time.
characters.rules_text: CLEAN UP , Banish one of your items — Draw a card.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Resourceful Infiltrator
characters.author: Joseph Buenning
characters.rules_text: JUST WHAT YOU NEED When you play this character, you may give another chosen character Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Little Sister
characters.subtitle: Responsible Rabbit
characters.author: Andrea Parisi
characters.flavor_text: As Skippy's older sister, she's had lots of experience putting things back together.
characters.rules_text: LET ME HELP When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Adelaide Bonfamille
characters.subtitle: Patron of the Arts
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.flavor_text: Beautiful music can ennoble one’s spirit, no matter how dire things seem.

characters.name: Nani
characters.subtitle: Heist Mastermind
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.rules_text: STICK TO THE PLAN — Another chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.) IT'S UP TO YOU, LILO Your characters named Lilo gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Experiment 626
characters.author: Matteo Marzocco
characters.rules_text: SO NAUGHTY When you play this character, each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted. STEALTH MODE At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may choose and discard a card with to play this character for free and he enters play exerted.

characters.name: Ratigan
characters.subtitle: Greedy Genius
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) TIME RUNS OUT At the end of your turn, if you didn't put any cards into your inkwell this turn, banish this character.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Determined Squire
characters.author: Edu Francisco
characters.flavor_text: Do you want to be all muscle and no brain? —Merlin
characters.rules_text: NO MORE BOOKS Skip your turn's Draw step.

characters.name: Bernard
characters.subtitle: Over-Prepared
characters.author: McKay Anderson
characters.flavor_text: Miss Bianca, over here! I found something!
characters.rules_text: GO DOWN THERE AND INVESTIGATE When you play this character, if you have an Ally character in play, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Vigilant Guard
characters.author: Marcel Berg
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) SAFE PASSAGE Whenever one of your Ally characters quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Steady Strategist
characters.author: Hedvig H-S
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) ALWAYS PLANNING Whenever this character quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Ally character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Roquefort
characters.subtitle: Lock Expert
characters.author: Anderson Mahanski
characters.flavor_text: Jafar will never expect us to hide lore from him in his own safe! How exciting!
characters.rules_text: SAFEKEEPING Whenever this character quests, you may put chosen item into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Jumba Jookiba
characters.subtitle: Critical Scientist
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.flavor_text: This little thing has a much more rudimentary design than if I had created it. But if you were rushing development, then this makes sense.

characters.name: Geppetto
characters.subtitle: Skilled Craftsman
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.flavor_text: Everything he carves is a work of art.
characters.rules_text: SEEKING INSPIRATION Whenever this character quests, you may choose and discard any number of item cards to gain 1 lore for each item card discarded this way.

characters.name: Atitaya
characters.subtitle: Fang General
characters.author: French Carlomagno
characters.flavor_text: Spears of Fang, stand strong and tall. We are the last line of defense and we will not fall!

characters.name: Bobby
characters.subtitle: Purple Pigeon
characters.author: Adam Fenton
characters.flavor_text: You come at me, you get the beak, capisce?
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Magic Carpet
characters.subtitle: Phantom Rug
characters.author: Andrea Parisi
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.) SPECTRAL FORCE Your other Illusion characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 while challenging.)

characters.name: Prince Achmed
characters.subtitle: Rival Suitor
characters.author: Jake Murphy
characters.flavor_text: Talk about overdressed and self-absorbed! —Jasmine
characters.rules_text: UNWELCOME PROPOSAL When you play this character, you may exert chosen Princess character.

characters.name: Dumptruck
characters.subtitle: Karnage's Second Mate
characters.author: Adam Fenton
characters.flavor_text: Say, let me do it, Mad Dog. It's my turn.
characters.rules_text: LET ME AT 'EM When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: Forceful Duelist
characters.author: Ornella Savarese
characters.flavor_text: How dare you? Arm yourself, scoundrel!
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: General Li
characters.subtitle: Head of the Imperial Army
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: A single grain of rice can tip the scale. One man may be the difference between victory and defeat. —The Emperor
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Monterey Jack
characters.subtitle: Defiant Protector
characters.author: Ricardo Caria
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Genie
characters.subtitle: Satisfied Dragon
characters.author: Rosa la Barbera / Livio Cacciatore
characters.rules_text: BUG CATCHER During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Toby Turtle
characters.subtitle: Wary Friend
characters.author: Irish Chua
characters.flavor_text: This place is scarier than Prince John.
characters.rules_text: HARD SHELL While this character is exerted, he gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Arianna
characters.subtitle: Queen of Corona
characters.author: Carmine Pucci
characters.flavor_text: In dark times, a crown is a weighty honor we must bear with grace and courage.

characters.name: Zipper
characters.subtitle: Flying Ranger
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: BEST MATES If you have a character named Monterey Jack in play, you pay 1 less to play this character. BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Khan
characters.subtitle: War Horse
characters.author: Defne Tözüm
characters.flavor_text: When the whole world changes around you, remember that Khan will always be the same—steadfast and true. —Fa Zhou

characters.name: Vinnie
characters.subtitle: Green Pigeon
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.flavor_text: That’s quite a predicament you’re in. Glad it ain’t me.
characters.rules_text: LEARNING EXPERIENCE During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Out of Reach
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: Nice try, chumps! Too bad I’m all the way up here!
characters.rules_text: SELF-PRESERVATION While you have another exerted character in play, this character can't be challenged.

characters.name: Nathaniel Flint
characters.subtitle: Notorious Pirate
characters.author: Edu Francisco
characters.flavor_text: Flint's secret trove was never found, but stories have persisted that it remains hidden.. . —Narrator
characters.rules_text: PREDATORY INSTINCT You can't play this character unless an opposing character was damaged this turn.

characters.name: Vincenzo Santorini
characters.subtitle: The Explosives Expert
characters.author: Ha Jung Song
characters.flavor_text: Never be afraid to make a big entrance.
characters.rules_text: I JUST LIKE TO BLOW THINGS UP When you play this character, you may deal 3 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Namaari
characters.subtitle: Single-Minded Rival
characters.author: Max Ulichney
characters.rules_text: STRATEGIC EDGE When you play this character and at the start of your turn, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card. EXTREME FOCUS This character gets +1 for each card in your discard.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Giant Mouse
characters.author: Joy Ang / Giulia Riva
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) THE BIGGEST STAR EVER When this character is banished, deal 5 damage to each opposing character.

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Alien Troublemaker
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez / Andrew Theophilopoulos
characters.flavor_text: Ah! Finally, a good use for his destructive instincts. —Jumba Jookiba
characters.rules_text: I WIN! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card and gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Decisive Dog
characters.author: Juan Diego León
characters.rules_text: PACK OF HER OWN Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 this turn. TAKE THE LEAD While this character has 3 or more, she gets +2.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Big Lug
characters.author: Sam Nielson
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Wreck-It Ralph.) BACK ON TRACK When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return a Racer character card with cost 6 or less from your discard to your hand. If you do, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Perdita
characters.subtitle: Determined Mother
characters.author: Natalie Dombois
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Perdita.) QUICK, EVERYONE HIDE When you play this character, you may put all Puppy character cards from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Bambi
characters.subtitle: Little Prince
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.rules_text: SAY HELLO When you play this character, gain 1 lore. KIND OF BASHFUL When an opponent plays a character, return this character to your hand.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Impulsive Llama
characters.author: Alan Batson
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Kuzco.) WHAT DOES THIS DO? When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. Then, each opponent may draw a card.

characters.name: Mother Gothel
characters.subtitle: Knows What's Best
characters.author: Andrew Theophilopoulos
characters.rules_text: LOOK WHAT YOU'VE DONE When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to give that character Challenger +1 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +1 while challenging.)

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: High Climber
characters.author: Viv Tanner / Ellie Horie
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WRAPPED UP Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: The Pirate King
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) GIVE ’EM ALL YOU GOT! Once during your turn, whenever an opposing character is damaged, your Pirate characters get +2 and gain Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

characters.name: Lilo
characters.subtitle: Causing an Uproar
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: STOMPIN' TIME! During your turn, if you've played 3 or more actions this turn, you may play this character for free. RAAAWR! When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Mushu
characters.subtitle: Your Worst Nightmare
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mushu.) ALL FIRED UP Whenever you play another character, they gain Rush, Reckless, and Evasive this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played. They can't quest and must challenge if able. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Experiment 626
characters.author: Natalie Dombois
characters.rules_text: SO NAUGHTY When you play this character, each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted. STEALTH MODE At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may choose and discard a card with to play this character for free and he enters play exerted.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Steady Strategist
characters.author: Viv Tanner
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) ALWAYS PLANNING Whenever this character quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Ally character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Groundbreaking Chef
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: You're just in time for Surprise à la Goof!
characters.rules_text: PLENTY TO GO AROUND At the end of your turn, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your other characters. Ready each character you removed damage from this way.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Strings Attached
characters.author: Hedvig H-S
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) GOT TO KEEP REAL QUIET Once during your turn, whenever you ready this character, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.subtitle: Tried and True
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.rules_text: HAPPY HELPER While this character has no damage, he gets +2 and gains Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Archimedes
characters.subtitle: Resourceful Owl
characters.author: Gwawi
characters.rules_text: YOU DON'T NEED THAT When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. NOW, THAT'S NOT BAD During your turn, whenever an item is banished, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Daring Defender
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) TRUE VALOR This character gets +1 for each 1 damage on her.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Out of Reach
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: Nice try, chumps! Too bad I’m all the way up here!
characters.rules_text: SELF-PRESERVATION While you have another exerted character in play, this character can’t be challenged.

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Decisive Dog
characters.author: Therese Vildefall
characters.rules_text: PACK OF HER OWN Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 this turn. TAKE THE LEAD While this character has 3 or more, she gets +2.

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Vigilant Guard
characters.author: Marcel Berg
