characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) SAFE PASSAGE Whenever one of your Ally characters quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

characters.name: Patch
characters.subtitle: Playful Pup
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.flavor_text: Sand sure was more fun than it looked!
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) PUPPY BARKING While you have another Puppy character in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: High Sultan of Lorcana
characters.author: John Loren / Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: DARK POWER Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card. If an Illusion character card is discarded this way, you may play that character for free.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: High Sultan of Lorcana
characters.author: John Loren / Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: DARK POWER Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card. If an Illusion character card is discarded this way, you may play that character for free.

characters.name: Metal Scorpion
characters.subtitle: Deadly Statue
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SIMULTANEOUS STRIKE When Jafar plays this character, each Illumineer chooses and banishes one of their characters, one of their items, and one of their locations.

characters.name: Palace Guard
characters.subtitle: Crown Hunter
characters.author: Anderson Mahanski
characters.flavor_text: Ah, yes. I'll be taking that.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: BRING IT TO ME When Jafar plays this character, he steals The Reforged Crown.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Raucous Lookout
characters.author: Diogo Saito
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (An opposing character who challenges one of Jafar's characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) JAFAR'S SENTRY This character enters play exerted. SOUND THE ALARM While this character is exerted, Jafar's locations can’t be challenged.

characters.name: Razoul
characters.subtitle: Unyielding Guard
characters.author: Omar Lozano
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (An opposing character who challenges one of Jafar's characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) JAFAR'S SENTRY This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Treasure Guardian
characters.subtitle: Illusionary Protector
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: Oh dear, have the rules changed? How dreadfully sad... for you.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: SHIFTING SANDS Illumineers can’t use battleground abilities.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Spectral Sorcerer
characters.author: Luigi Aimè
characters.flavor_text: You didn't think this was over, did you? Bow before true power!
characters.rules_text: RETURN TO ME! When Jafar plays this character, he plays all items named Mechanical Snake from his discard for free.

characters.name: Genie
characters.subtitle: Towering Phantasm
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: Behold the power of my sorcery. This genie is mine!%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: PERFECT TIMING When Jafar plays this character, if each Illumineer has an exerted character in play, he gains 3 lore.

characters.name: The Sultan
characters.subtitle: Spectral Ruler
characters.author: Grace Woo
characters.flavor_text: Now <he’s> bowing before <me>.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: PAY FEALTY When Jafar plays this character, each Illumineer chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Ephemeral Princess
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.flavor_text: This version may be less substantial than the real princess, but you must admit, she'll do.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: OVER HERE! Whenever this character quests, Jafar draws a card.

characters.name: Gazeem
characters.subtitle: Ruthless Ruffian
characters.author: James Rey Sanchez
characters.flavor_text: What he lacks in manners he makes up in sheer cruelty.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: FIGHTING DIRTY When Jafar plays this character, he deals 2 damage to each opposing damaged character.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Crown Seeker
characters.author: Eva Widermann
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) GOTCHA! Whenever this character quests, Jafar steals the Reforged Crown.

characters.name: Monumental Beetle
characters.subtitle: Skittering Statue
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.flavor_text: Just the thing to deal with pests like you!%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: SECRET VULNERABILITY During the Illumineers’ turn, they may pay 3 each to banish this character.

characters.name: Gargantuan Cobra
characters.subtitle: Slithering Statue
characters.author: Diego Machuca
characters.flavor_text: Behold the wonders of true power! Even the stone is mine to command!%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: SERPENT’S SHADOW When Jafar plays this character, he deals 3 damage to each opposing exerted character.

characters.name: Tiger Behemoth
characters.subtitle: Hulking Statue
characters.author: Diego Machuca
characters.flavor_text: The palace guardians don’t take kindly to interlopers. Consider yourself warned.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: DREADFUL STARE This character can’t be challenged by damaged characters.

characters.name: Abu
characters.subtitle: Cheeky Phantasm
characters.author: Shutianyi Li
characters.flavor_text: Why, yes, he <is> annoying. So kind of you to notice. I wanted this illusion to be as accurate as possible.%—Jafar

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Misleading Phantom
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.flavor_text: The best part about this illusion? He knows his place.%—Jafar
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Shadow Sleuth
characters.author: Marc Perez
characters.flavor_text: I'll admit, he has a great mind—for a mouse.%—Jafar

characters.name: Rhino
characters.subtitle: Motivational Speaker
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: Don't forget, you are awesome. You can handle anything. Now channel your inner awesomeness and CLEAR THIS TRAP!
characters.rules_text: DESTINY CALLING Your other characters get +2.

characters.name: Perdita
characters.subtitle: Playful Mother
characters.author: Cécile Carre
characters.rules_text: WHO'S NEXT? Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 less for the next Puppy character you play this turn. DON'T BE AFRAID Your Puppy characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: King Stefan
characters.subtitle: New Father
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.flavor_text: Every parent struggles with getting their baby to sleep. Kings are no different.

characters.name: Bolt
characters.subtitle: Superdog
characters.author: John Loren / Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Bolt.) MARK OF POWER Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each other undamaged character you have in play. BOLT STARE — Banish chosen Illusion character.

characters.name: Roger Radcliffe
characters.subtitle: Dog Lover
characters.author: Hedvig H-S
characters.flavor_text: The best part of completing the obstacle course was finding their human at the end.
characters.rules_text: THERE YOU GO Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your Puppy characters.

characters.name: Trusty
characters.subtitle: Loyal Bloodhound
characters.author: Yu Nguyễn
characters.flavor_text: As my grandpappy, Old Reliable, used to say, save your energy for when it matters.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Peg
characters.subtitle: Natural Performer
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: She was born to be a star no matter where she performed.
characters.rules_text: CAPTIVE AUDIENCE — If you have 3 or more other characters in play, draw a card.

characters.name: Suzy
characters.subtitle: Master Seamstress
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: The devoted mice were excited to surprise Cinderella with a new dress. Smiling, Archazia gave them a spool of magic thread. This will make it perfect, she said.

characters.name: Mittens
characters.subtitle: Sassy Street Cat
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) NO THANKS NECESSARY Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, your other characters with Bodyguard get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Tramp
characters.subtitle: Street-Smart Dog
characters.author: Alan Batson
characters.rules_text: NOW IT'S A PARTY For each character you have in play, you pay 1 less to play this character. HOW'S PICKINGS? When you play this character, you may draw a card for each other character you have in play, then choose and discard that many cards.

characters.name: The Troubadour
characters.subtitle: Musical Narrator
characters.author: Carmine Pucci
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

characters.name: Wendy Darling
characters.subtitle: Pirate Queen
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) TELL NO TALES Whenever one of your other characters is banished, you may remove all damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Mirabel Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Hopeful Dreamer
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: My family's amazing, and I'm in my family, so...
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Waking Beauty
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.rules_text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) SWEET DREAMS Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from a character, ready this character. She can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.subtitle: The Right One
characters.author: Tania Soler
characters.flavor_text: But, you see, I have the other slipper.
characters.rules_text: IF THE SLIPPER FITS When you play this character, you may put an item card named The Glass Slipper from your discard on the bottom of your deck to gain 3 lore.

characters.name: Mariano Guzman
characters.subtitle: Handsome Suitor
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: The puzzles of the heart are trickier than anything Archazia could come up with.
characters.rules_text: I SEE YOU While you have a character named Dolores Madrigal in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Candlehead
characters.subtitle: Dedicated Racer
characters.author: Kapik
characters.rules_text: WINNING ISN'T EVERYTHING When this character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Bolt
characters.subtitle: Dependable Friend
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: Super dog versus super log! This is AWESOME! —Rhino
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Pascal
characters.subtitle: Garden Chameleon
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: Once Pascal got into Archazia’s flowerbeds, there was no getting him out.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: King Candy
characters.subtitle: Royal Racer
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.flavor_text: Get off of my track!
characters.rules_text: SWEET REVENGE Whenever one of your other Racer characters is banished, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

characters.name: Penny
characters.subtitle: Bolt's Person
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.rules_text: ENDURING LOYALTY When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character and they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
characters.subtitle: Pint-Sized Hero
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.flavor_text: A trap is just a puzzle that's not very friendly.
characters.rules_text: LET'S GET TO WORK Whenever you return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand, you may ready chosen Racer character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Thunderbolt
characters.subtitle: Wonder Dog
characters.author: Max Grecke
characters.rules_text: Puppy Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your Puppy characters.) Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: The Prince
characters.subtitle: Vigilant Suitor
characters.author: João Moura
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Isabela Madrigal
characters.subtitle: In the Moment
characters.author: César Vergara
characters.flavor_text: I just made something unexpected. Something sharp, something new.
characters.rules_text: I'M TIRED OF PERFECT Whenever one of your characters sings a song, this character can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Calhoun
characters.subtitle: Courageous Rescuer
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Calhoun.) BACK TO START POSITIONS! Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Hero's Duty
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.flavor_text: I got that medal in the bag.
characters.rules_text: OUTFLANK During your turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, this character gets +1 this turn.

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Miss Park Avenue
characters.author: João Moura
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady.) SOMETHING WONDERFUL When you play this character, you may return up to 2 character cards with cost 2 or less each from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Pongo
characters.subtitle: Dear Old Dad
characters.author: Cécile Carre
characters.flavor_text: Tricks and traps are nothing for plucky pups.
characters.rules_text: FOUND YOU, YOU LITTLE RASCAL At the start of your turn, look at the cards in your inkwell. You may play a Puppy character from there for free.

characters.name: Kenai
characters.subtitle: Protective Brother
characters.author: Julien Vandois
characters.rules_text: HE NEEDS ME At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours and remove all damage from them.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Storyteller
characters.author: SCG
characters.rules_text: GATHER AROUND Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 this turn. JUST ONE MORE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character loses equal to this character's until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Perla
characters.subtitle: Nimble Seamstress
characters.author: Kapik
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Snow White
characters.subtitle: Fairest in the Land
characters.author: Mario Manzanares
characters.flavor_text: A true heart can thwart many an evil scheme.
characters.rules_text: HIDDEN AWAY This character can't be challenged.

characters.name: Koda
characters.subtitle: Smallish Bear
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: And then they were like, ‘How’d you catch so many fish, Koda?’ And I said, ‘Well, you know me. I <know> how to catch fish.’ And they said...

characters.name: Mirabel Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Musically Talented
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mirabel Madrigal.) HER OWN SPECIAL GIFT Whenever this character quests, you may return a song card with cost 3 or less from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Calhoun
characters.subtitle: Battle-Tested
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Preparation and luck—you can only rely on one to win a fight!
characters.rules_text: TACTICAL ADVANTAGE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to give chosen opposing character -3 until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Pepa Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Sensitive Sister
characters.author: Valentina Graziuso
characters.flavor_text: Archazia’s calming presence helped Pepa dispel her dark mood.
characters.rules_text: CLEAR SKIES, CLEAR SKIES Whenever one or more of your characters sings a song, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Temporary Whale
characters.author: Luca Pinelli
characters.rules_text: DON'T YOU SAY A WORD Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return chosen character, item, or location with cost 2 or less to their player's hand, then that player draws a card.

characters.name: Tanana
characters.subtitle: Tribal Elder
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: This is a place of wonder and learning. Pay attention to the Owl and see what she can teach you.

characters.name: Treasure Guardian
characters.subtitle: Foreboding Sentry
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.flavor_text: At last, after all my years of searching! —Jafar
characters.rules_text: UNTOLD TREASURE When you play this character, if you have an Illusion character in play, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Honeymaren
characters.subtitle: Northuldra Guide
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.flavor_text: It's said to be a bridge between us and the magic of nature.
characters.rules_text: TALE OF THE FIFTH SPIRIT When you play this character, if an opponent has an exerted character in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Giant Spectral Parrot
characters.author: John Loren / Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)

characters.name: Chernabog
characters.subtitle: Creature of the Night
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.rules_text: MIDNIGHT REVEL When you play this character, each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Newly Crowned
characters.author: John Loren / Nicholas Kole
characters.flavor_text: Now that the Hexwell Crown is finally mine, no force in Lorcana can stand against me!
characters.rules_text: THIS IS NOT DONE YET During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your Illusion characters is banished, you may return that card to your hand.

characters.name: Hades
characters.subtitle: Fast Talker
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: ... You get a whole lotta gain.
characters.rules_text: FOR JUST A LITTLE PAIN When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to banish chosen character with cost 3 or less.

characters.name: Madame Medusa
characters.subtitle: Diamond Lover
characters.author: Roger Pérez
characters.rules_text: SEARCH THE SWAMP Whenever this character quests, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to put the top 3 cards of chosen player's deck into their discard.

characters.name: Te Kā
characters.subtitle: Elemental Terror
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 7 (You may pay 7 to play this on top of one of your characters named Te Kā.) ANCIENT RAGE During your turn, whenever an opposing character is exerted, banish them.

characters.name: Elsa
characters.subtitle: Trusted Sister
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.flavor_text: Fear is what can't be trusted.
characters.rules_text: WHAT DO WE DO NOW? Whenever this character quests, if you have a character named Anna in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Madam Mim
characters.subtitle: Cheating Spellcaster
characters.author: Jocelyn Sepulveda
characters.flavor_text: She only wants rules so she can break them! —Archimedes
characters.rules_text: PLAY ROUGH Whenever this character quests, exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Giant Cobra
characters.subtitle: Ghostly Serpent
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.) MYSTERIOUS ADVANTAGE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Te Kā
characters.subtitle: Lava Monster
characters.author: Max Grecke
characters.flavor_text: You wanna get to Te Fiti, you have to go through a whole ocean of bad. Not to mention Te Kā. —Maui
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Transformed Kitten
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.flavor_text: Yes, I’ve already finished this course. I'm still going to bounce a few more times.
characters.rules_text: I WIN When this character is banished, if you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, you may return this card to your hand.

characters.name: Bucky
characters.subtitle: Nutty Rascal
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.flavor_text: Oh, hang on. I love this bit! He pops the balloon and all those acorns go flying out. Gets me every time. —Kronk
characters.rules_text: POP! When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Pain
characters.subtitle: Impudent Imp
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.flavor_text: Um, wasn’t there something the boss wanted us to take care of? Was it testing these arrows?

characters.name: Rajah
characters.subtitle: Ghostly Tiger
characters.author: Andrea Femerstrand
characters.flavor_text: He may be spectral, but the danger is very real.
characters.rules_text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)

characters.name: Kronk
characters.subtitle: Laid Back
characters.author: Tony Bancroft / Lindsay Weyman
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) I'M LOVIN' THIS If an effect would cause you to discard one or more cards, you don't discard.

characters.name: Mother Gothel
characters.subtitle: Vain Sorceress
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: NOW YOU'VE UPSET ME Whenever one of your characters challenges, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Sven
characters.subtitle: Keen-Eyed Reindeer
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) FORMIDABLE GLARE When you play this character, chosen character gets -3 this turn.

characters.name: Diablo
characters.subtitle: Spiteful Raven
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Clever Clairvoyant
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.rules_text: PRESTIDIGITONIUM Whenever this character quests, name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your inkwell facedown and exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Above It All
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) BACK TO WORK Whenever another character is banished in a challenge, return that card to its player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

characters.name: Elsa
characters.subtitle: Ice Maker
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.) WINTER WALL Whenever this character quests, you may exert chosen character. If you do and you have a character named Anna in play, the chosen character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Kenai
characters.subtitle: Magical Bear
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.) WISDOM OF HIS STORY During your turn, when this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand and gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Panicked Llama
characters.author: Florencia Vazquez
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WE CAN FIGURE THIS OUT At the start of your turn, choose one: • Each player draws a card. • Each player chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Ice Breaker
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) WINTER AMBUSH When you play this character, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Flustered Sorcerer
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.flavor_text: When it comes to magic spells, proper pronunciation is key.
characters.rules_text: OBFUSCATE! Opponents need 25 lore to win the game.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Jealous Beauty
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.rules_text: NO ORDINARY APPLE — Choose 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and put them on the bottom of their deck to gain 3 lore. If any Princess cards were moved this way, gain 4 lore instead.

characters.name: Panic
characters.subtitle: High-Strung Imp
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.flavor_text: What the boss doesn’t know won’t hurt us. Much. I hope.
characters.rules_text: STARTLED SHRIEK When you play this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Archimedes
characters.subtitle: Exceptional Owl
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: Archazia’s library was a treasure trove of knowledge even for such an educated owl.
characters.rules_text: MORE TO LEARN Whenever an opponent chooses this character for an action or ability, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Kashekim
characters.subtitle: Ancient Ruler
characters.author: Jocelyn Sepulveda
characters.flavor_text: You presume much, to think you are welcome here.

characters.name: Dolores Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Within Earshot
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: She heard Mariano’s heart skip a beat. Was it because of the puzzle, or was he looking at her?
characters.rules_text: I HEAR YOU Whenever one of your characters sings a song, chosen opponent reveals their hand.

characters.name: Mufasa
characters.subtitle: Among the Stars
characters.author: Andrea Femerstrand
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mufasa.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Drizella
characters.subtitle: Spoiled Stepsister
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: Once again, Drizella was confronted with a simple truth: life wasn’t fair.

characters.name: Grewnge
characters.subtitle: Cannon Expert
characters.author: Simangaliso Sibaya / Mario Manzanares
characters.flavor_text: He loves two things: explosions and even more explosions.
characters.rules_text: RAPID FIRE Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 less for the next action you play this turn.

characters.name: Baymax
characters.subtitle: Low Battery
characters.author: McKay Anderson
characters.flavor_text: Processing data from Archazia's thought scrolls is taking a great deal of power. Extreme battery saver protocol engaged.
characters.rules_text: SHHHHH This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Thomas O'Malley
characters.subtitle: Feline Charmer
characters.author: Kasia Brzezinska
characters.flavor_text: There's nothing he can’t talk his way out of.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Pirate Scoundrel
characters.author: Serena Wade
characters.flavor_text: I wasn't stealin' it! I was just keepin' it safe.
characters.rules_text: PILFER AND PLUNDER Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may banish chosen item.

characters.name: Hiro Hamada
characters.subtitle: Future Champion
characters.author: Jennifer Wu
characters.flavor_text: Even with a mind as brilliant as his, the mixed ink was a unique puzzle to solve.
characters.rules_text: ORIGIN STORY When you play a Floodborn character on this card, draw a card.

characters.name: Cheshire Cat
characters.subtitle: Perplexing Feline
characters.author: Sandara Tang
characters.flavor_text: He's not your average cat, after all. Then again, what cat is? —Archazia
characters.rules_text: MAD GRIN When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

characters.name: Shere Khan
characters.subtitle: Infamous Tiger
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: He'd be the first to tell you he's as magnificent as he is deadly.
characters.rules_text: WHAT A PITY When you play this character, discard your hand.

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Secret Informer
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: The final part of the crown! Jafar will be pleased.
characters.rules_text: DRAW THEM OUT Whenever this character quests, opposing damaged characters gain Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Mad Hatter
characters.subtitle: Unruly Eccentric
characters.author: John Loren / Nicholas Kole
characters.flavor_text: Don't you care for tea?
characters.rules_text: UNBIRTHDAY PRESENT Whenever a damaged character challenges another character, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Queen of Hearts
characters.subtitle: Unpredictable Bully
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.) IF I LOSE MY TEMPER... Whenever another character is played, put a damage counter on them.

characters.name: Hiro Hamada
characters.subtitle: Armor Designer
characters.author: Alan Batson
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Hiro Hamada.) YOU CAN BE WAY MORE Your Floodborn characters that have a card under them gain Evasive and Ward. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them. Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Yokai
characters.subtitle: Intellectual Schemer
characters.author: Diogo Saito
characters.flavor_text: In the hands of a lesser person, this much power would be irresponsible.
characters.rules_text: INNOVATE You pay 1 less to play characters using their Shift ability.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Lively Pirate
characters.author: João Moura
characters.flavor_text: Aye aye, Captain! I’ll get it done.
characters.rules_text: DUCK OF ACTION Whenever this character is challenged, you may return an action card that isn't a song card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Berlioz
characters.subtitle: Mischievous Kitten
characters.author: Geoffrey Boudout
characters.flavor_text: Look what I found! Can we stay here and play?

characters.name: Lady
characters.subtitle: Elegant Spaniel
characters.author: Sara Leal (Loyal)
characters.flavor_text: Are you sure we’re allowed in here? Jim Dear would never allow me in the kitchen.
characters.rules_text: A DOG'S LIFE While you have a character named Tramp in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Exasperated Schemer
characters.author: Mel Milton
characters.flavor_text: One of these must be the right lever, but I’ll be a llama’s aunt if I can figure out which one...
characters.rules_text: HOW SHALL I DO IT? When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Pacha
characters.subtitle: Trekmate
characters.author: Luca Pinelli
characters.flavor_text: He liked to prepare for any emergency. They happened frequently with Kuzco around.
characters.rules_text: FULL PACK While you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Tweedledee & Tweedledum
characters.subtitle: Strange Storytellers
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: You can’t leave yet! Don’t you want to hear the ending? —Tweedledee
characters.rules_text: ANOTHER RECITATION Whenever this character quests, you may return chosen damaged character to their player's hand.

characters.name: Baymax
characters.subtitle: Giant Robot
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.rules_text: Universal Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of any one of your characters.) FUNCTIONALITY IMPROVED When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, remove all damage from him.

characters.name: Gizmoduck
characters.subtitle: Suited Up
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) BLATHERING BLATHERSKITE This character can challenge ready damaged characters.

characters.name: Fidget
characters.subtitle: Sneaky Bat
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) I TOOK CARE OF EVERYTHING Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Mr. Smee
characters.subtitle: Efficient Captain
characters.author: João Moura
characters.flavor_text: All right now, crew–we’ve a lot to do today!
characters.rules_text: PIPE UP THE CREW Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may ready chosen Pirate character.

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.subtitle: Multitalented Pirate
characters.author: Emily Abeydeera
characters.flavor_text: A captain must be inventive, commanding, and unafraid of trampolines.
characters.rules_text: FOWL PLAY Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

characters.name: John Silver
characters.subtitle: Vengeful Pirate
characters.author: Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: DRAWN TO A FIGHT If an opposing character was damaged this turn, you pay 2 less to play this character. Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) I AIN'T GONE SOFT! Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Tramp
characters.subtitle: Enterprising Dog
characters.author: Amanda MacFarlane
characters.rules_text: HEY, PIDGE If you have a character named Lady in play, you pay 1 less to play this character. NO TIME FOR WISECRACKS When you play this character, chosen character of yours gets +1 this turn for each other character you have in play.

characters.name: King of Hearts
characters.subtitle: Picky Ruler
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: You there! You can’t be here in the state you’re in. Begone before the Queen sees this mess!
characters.rules_text: OBJECTIONABLE STATE Damaged characters can't challenge your characters.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.subtitle: Elegant Feline
characters.author: Therese Vildefall
characters.flavor_text: Now darlings, pay close attention to where we are. What can you learn about the Owl from the house?

characters.name: Anastasia
characters.subtitle: Bossy Stepsister
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: Out of my way! <I’m> going to be the first to finish!
characters.rules_text: OH, I HATE THIS! Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Space Pirate
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Pete.) FRIGHTFUL SCHEME While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't exert to sing songs and your Pirate characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Lady Tremaine
characters.subtitle: Bitterly Jealous
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.rules_text: THAT'S QUITE ENOUGH — Return chosen damaged character to their player's hand. Then, each opponent discards a card at random.

characters.name: Grandmother Fa
characters.subtitle: Spirited Elder
characters.author: Javi Salas
characters.flavor_text: Fear will get you hurt. Luck will get you through.
characters.rules_text: I'VE GOT ALL THE LUCK WE'LL NEED Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character of yours +2 this turn.

characters.name: Queen of Hearts
characters.subtitle: Losing Her Temper
characters.author: Antoine Couttolenc / Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: Something told the Illumineers she'd had enough of the obstacles.
characters.rules_text: ROYAL PAIN While this character has damage, she gets +3.

characters.name: The Matchmaker
characters.subtitle: Unforgiving Expert
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Who spit in her bean curd? —Grandmother Fa
characters.rules_text: YOU ARE A DISGRACE! Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Denahi
characters.subtitle: Impatient Hunter
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: There's no time. We have to act now!
characters.rules_text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)

characters.name: Stabbington Brother
characters.subtitle: Without a Patch
characters.author: Florencia Vazquez
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) GET 'EM! Your other characters named Stabbington Brother gain Rush.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Mechanic Extraordinaire
characters.author: Koni
characters.rules_text: Shift 7 SALVAGE For each item card in your discard, you pay 1 less to play this character using her Shift ability. REPURPOSE Whenever this character quests, you may put up to 3 item cards from your discard on the bottom of your deck to gain 1 lore for each item card moved this way.

characters.name: Cy-Bug
characters.subtitle: Invasive Enemy
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: Cy-Bugs are like a virus. They don’t know they’re in a game. —Calhoun
characters.rules_text: HIVE MIND This character gets +1 for each other character you have in play.

characters.name: Stabbington Brother
characters.subtitle: With a Patch
characters.author: Saulo Nate
characters.flavor_text: Silence is golden. And he loves gold.
characters.rules_text: CRIME OF OPPORTUNITY When you play this character, chosen opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Card Soldiers
characters.subtitle: Royal Troops
characters.author: Kamil Murzyn
characters.flavor_text: The Three of Hearts raised his spear and whispered to himself, While others fall, a Queen's soldier stands tall.
characters.rules_text: TAKE POINT While a damaged character is in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Cogsworth
characters.subtitle: Climbing Clock
characters.author: Tony Bancroft / Lindsay Weyman
characters.flavor_text: Top shelf? Pshaw! If it’s a book the mademoiselle wants, I’ll find a way to get it for her!
characters.rules_text: STILL USEFUL While you have an item card in your discard, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Toby
characters.subtitle: Dogged Companion
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: Toby has the most splendid sense of smell of any hound I’ve trained. But he can be deucedly frisky. —Basil

characters.name: Beagle Boys
characters.subtitle: Small-Time Crooks
characters.author: Lauren Barger
characters.rules_text: HURRY IT UP! Whenever this character quests, chosen character of yours gains Rush and Resist +1 this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Li Shang
characters.subtitle: Newly Promoted
characters.author: Ian MacDonald
characters.rules_text: I WON'T LET YOU DOWN This character can challenge ready characters. ENORMOUS RESPONSIBILITY While this character has damage, he gets +2.

characters.name: Moana
characters.subtitle: Island Explorer
characters.author: Jackie Droujko
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ADVENTUROUS SPIRIT Whenever this character challenges another character, another chosen character of yours gets +3 this turn.

characters.name: The Phantom Blot
characters.subtitle: Shadowy Figure
characters.author: Luca Pinelli
characters.flavor_text: Nobody knows who or what he really is or what he’s planning.
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Beast
characters.subtitle: Frustrated Designer
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: No, no, no! This is NOT THE WAY I SEE IT IN MY HEAD!
characters.rules_text: I'VE HAD IT! , 2 , Banish 2 of your items — Deal 5 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Mushu
characters.subtitle: Majestic Dragon
characters.author: Tom Bancroft
characters.rules_text: INTIMIDATING AND AWE-INSPIRING Whenever one of your characters challenges, they gain Resist +2 during that challenge. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.) GUARDIAN OF LOST SOULS During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Maurice
characters.subtitle: Unconventional Inventor
characters.author: Andy Estrada / Greg Shrader
characters.rules_text: HOW ON EARTH DID THAT HAPPEN? When you play this character, you may banish chosen item of yours to draw a card. If the banished item is named Maurice's Machine, you may also banish chosen character with 2 or less.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Extreme Athlete
characters.author: Teresita Q. / SCG
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) STAR POWER Whenever this character challenges another character, your other characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke
characters.subtitle: Crystallized Mercenary
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: He got what he wanted—just not the way he planned.
characters.rules_text: EXPLOSIVE Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, deal 2 damage to each character in play.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Imperial General
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) EXCEPTIONAL LEADER Whenever this character challenges another character, your other characters gain "This character can challenge ready characters" this turn.

characters.name: Baloo
characters.subtitle: Ol' Iron Paws
characters.author: Sergio Mancinelli
characters.flavor_text: Now, move. That's it. Now give me a big bear growl. Scare me.
characters.rules_text: FIGHT LIKE A BEAR Your characters with 7 or more can't be dealt damage.

characters.name: Ratigan
characters.subtitle: Nefarious Criminal
characters.author: Max Ulichney
characters.flavor_text: Why stop the show when you can simply steal it?
characters.rules_text: A MARVELOUS PERFORMANCE Whenever you play an action while this character is exerted, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Sir Kay
characters.subtitle: Unruly Knight
characters.author: Kevin Sidharta
characters.flavor_text: An owl in charge? Pshaw. He glared at the others. Then his eye fell on the targets set up nearby, and he brightened. But as long as I still get to joust...

characters.name: Milo Thatch
characters.subtitle: Undaunted Scholar
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: Okay, we rotated the globe to move the mural into position. We have the coordinates. Let's go!
characters.rules_text: I'M YOUR GUY Whenever you play an action, you may give chosen character +2 this turn.

characters.name: Edgar Balthazar
characters.subtitle: Ambitious Butler
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: All these traps, all these locks, all these machines... If they think that's going to stop me, they’ve sorely underestimated Edgar Balthazar!

characters.name: Clarabelle
characters.subtitle: News Reporter
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) BREAKING STORY Your other characters with Support get +1.

characters.name: Scrooge McDuck
characters.subtitle: Resourceful Miser
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.rules_text: PUT IT TO GOOD USE You may exert 4 items of yours to play this character for free. FORTUNE HUNTER When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Mattias
characters.subtitle: Arendelle General
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: You must move quickly before the trap resets. Go!
characters.rules_text: PROUD TO SERVE Your Queen characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Moana
characters.subtitle: Adventurer of Land and Sea
characters.author: Anna Stosik
characters.flavor_text: Moana receives a call from the ancestors to sail to new skies and reconnect people across the entire ocean.

characters.name: Monsieur D'Arque
characters.subtitle: Despicable Proprietor
characters.author: Kamil Murzyn
characters.flavor_text: I can help you with your problem... for the right price.
characters.rules_text: I'VE COME TO COLLECT Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item of yours to draw a card.

characters.name: Gaetan Moliere
characters.subtitle: The Mole
characters.author: Saulo Nate
characters.flavor_text: Fascinating. This shouldn't exist, yet it does. It may be older than the Great Illuminary itself.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Apprentice Inventor
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.flavor_text: Helping her dad keep the flying debris to a minimum.
characters.rules_text: WHAT A MESS During your turn, you may banish chosen item of yours to play this character for free.

characters.name: Lucky
characters.subtitle: Runt of the Litter
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.rules_text: FOLLOW MY VOICE Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Puppy character cards and put them in your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Dawson
characters.subtitle: Puzzling Sleuth
characters.author: Mario Oscar Gabriele
characters.flavor_text: I say, what sort of contraption <is> this?
characters.rules_text: BE SENSIBLE Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Tamatoa
characters.subtitle: Happy as a Clam
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.rules_text: COOLEST COLLECTION When you play this character, return up to 2 item cards from your discard to your hand. I'M BEAUTIFUL, BABY! Whenever this character quests, you may play an item for free.

characters.name: Heihei
characters.subtitle: Expanded Consciousness
characters.author: Maxine Vee
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Heihei.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) CLEAR YOUR MIND When you play this character, put all cards from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Kida
characters.subtitle: Creative Thinker
characters.author: Jennifer Park / Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) KEY TO THE PUZZLE — Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your inkwell facedown and exerted and the other on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Toulouse
characters.subtitle: Artistic Kitten
characters.author: Celeste Jamneck
characters.flavor_text: He squeezed more paint from the tube and wiggled in delight. Archazia was fun, even if she was a giant owl. She had so many new colors to paint with!

characters.name: Marie
characters.subtitle: Favored Kitten
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: Find yourself another Illumineer. This one's taken.
characters.rules_text: I'LL SHOW YOU Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character -2 this turn.

characters.name: Pepper
characters.subtitle: Quick-Thinking Puppy
characters.author: Rachel Elese
characters.flavor_text: Pepper proves every puppy is part of the pack.
characters.rules_text: IN THE NICK OF TIME Whenever one of your Puppy characters is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Freckles
characters.subtitle: Good Boy
characters.author: Laura Pauselli
characters.flavor_text: I want to play with the others! Can I, Dad? Please?
characters.rules_text: JUST SO CUTE! When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 this turn.

characters.name: Honey Lemon
characters.subtitle: Chemistry Whiz
characters.author: Brianna Garcia
characters.rules_text: PRETTY GREAT, HUH? Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Eye for Detail
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: There’s been a heap of legends and tall tales about Robin Hood. All different too. —Alan-a-Dale
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Penny the Orphan
characters.subtitle: Clever Child
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.flavor_text: Penny, dear, now don’t cry. We are here to help you. —Miss Bianca
characters.rules_text: OUR BOTTLE WORKED! While you have a Hero character in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Lady Kluck
characters.subtitle: Protective Confidant
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Inspired Researcher
characters.author: Victor "Yano" Covarrubias / Milica Celikovic
characters.flavor_text: Oh, this is wonderful! I <knew> Archazia's thought scrolls would be worth a little extra effort!
characters.rules_text: EXTRA ASSISTANCE Whenever this character quests, if you have no cards in your hand, draw a card for each Ally character you have in play.

characters.name: Jebidiah Farnsworth
characters.subtitle: Expedition Cook
characters.author: Pix Smith
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) I GOT YOUR FOUR BASIC FOOD GROUPS When you play this character, chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Baymax
characters.subtitle: Upgraded Robot
characters.author: Dustin Panzino
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) ADVANCED SCANNER When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Floodborn character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Maid Marian
characters.subtitle: Badminton Ace
characters.author: Emily Abeydeera
characters.rules_text: GOOD SHOT During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your Ally characters is damaged, deal 1 damage to chosen opposing character. FAIR PLAY Your characters named Lady Kluck gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Dr. Calico
characters.subtitle: Green-Eyed Man
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.flavor_text: Everything is positioning nicely.

characters.name: Jasmine
