characters.author: Seda Coskun
characters.rules_text: BY ORDER OF THE PRINCESS When you play this character, choose one: • Exert chosen damaged character. • Chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: Underhanded
characters.author: Tony Bancroft / Lindsay Weyman
characters.rules_text: INSPIRES DREAD While this character is exerted, opposing Pirate characters can't quest. UPPER HAND Whenever this character is challenged, draw a card.

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Alien Buccaneer
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) READY FOR ACTION When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may put an action card from your discard on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Go Go Tomago
characters.subtitle: Darting Dynamo
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) STOP WHINING, WOMAN UP When you play this character, you may pay 2 to gain lore equal to the damage on chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Honey Lemon
characters.subtitle: Chemical Genius
characters.author: Aristeidis Zentelis
characters.flavor_text: You're going to love this!
characters.rules_text: HERE'S THE BEST PART When you play this character, you may pay 2 to have each opponent choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Fred
characters.subtitle: Mascot by Day
characters.author: Cam Kendell / Danielle Powers
characters.flavor_text: ... but by night... I am also a school mascot.
characters.rules_text: HOW COOL IS THAT Whenever this character is challenged, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Tootles
characters.subtitle: Lost Boy
characters.author: Taraneh
characters.flavor_text: Every Lost Boy has a favorite hiding spot. Tootles has twelve.

characters.name: Dawson
characters.subtitle: Basil's Assistant
characters.author: Brittney Hackett
characters.flavor_text: By Jove, he must be around here somewhere. Basil! Basil! Shout if—aaahhh!

characters.name: Heathcliff
characters.subtitle: Stoic Butler
characters.author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: Loyal butler, training target, helicopter pilot—and completely unflappable.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Hypnotized Mouse
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Hmm. Footprints from a large... owl? With droplets of water? Clearly some avian menace has crossed the Azurite Sea and absconded with the crown!
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: First Mate
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.flavor_text: A promotion! It's about time someone recognized my natural leadership skills!
characters.rules_text: CAPTAIN ON DECK While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.subtitle: Pirate Captain
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.flavor_text: The answers we’re looking for are on the other side of that maze, I just know it!
characters.rules_text: DISTANT SHORES Whenever one of your Pirate characters quests while at a location, draw a card.

characters.name: Mertle Edmonds
characters.subtitle: Lilo's Rival
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: Get out of my way before I run you over.

characters.name: Prince Phillip
characters.subtitle: Royal Explorer
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: A clear head and a calm hand will see you through uncharted waters.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Royal Commodore
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) RULER OF THE SEAS When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, return all other exerted characters to their players' hands.

characters.name: Peter Pan
characters.subtitle: Never Land Prankster
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.rules_text: LOOK INNOCENT This character enters play exerted. CAN'T TAKE A JOKE? While this character is exerted, each opposing player can't gain lore unless one of their characters has challenged this turn.

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: Baby Demigod
characters.author: Kapik
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) STRONG LIKE HIS DAD 3 — Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character.

characters.name: Alistair Krei
characters.subtitle: Ambitious Entrepreneur
characters.author: Diogo Saito
characters.flavor_text: Sleek yet strong... These inkrunners are an extraordinary feat of engineering.
characters.rules_text: AN EYE FOR TECH When you play this character, if an opponent has an item in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Gazelle
characters.subtitle: Angel with Horns
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.rules_text: YOU CAN REALLY MOVE When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Expert Shipwright
characters.author: Max Ulichney
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) CLEVER DESIGN Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Bellwether
characters.subtitle: Assistant Mayor
characters.author: Samoldstoree
characters.rules_text: FEAR ALWAYS WORKS During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Disguised Detective
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.) TWISTS AND TURNS During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may pay 1 to have chosen opponent choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Olivia Flaversham
characters.subtitle: The Toymaker's Daughter
characters.author: Brittney Hackett
characters.flavor_text: She had searched high and low in the Illuminary for any hint of Basil. Instead, she found something completely unexpected...

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Pirate Captain
characters.author: Koni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) MARINER'S MIGHT Whenever this character quests, chosen Pirate character gets +2 and gains "This character takes no damage from challenges" this turn.

characters.name: Kakamora
characters.subtitle: Boarding Party
characters.author: Saulo Nate
characters.flavor_text: Moana: Do you think they saw us? Maui: They saw us.
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Kakamora
characters.subtitle: Pirate Pitcher
characters.author: Saulo Nate
characters.rules_text: DIZZYING SPEED When you play this character, chosen Pirate character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Rebellious Princess
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.flavor_text: Even the smallest mouse can make the biggest difference.
characters.rules_text: YOU'LL NEVER MISS IT Whenever this character quests, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Raya
characters.subtitle: Kumandran Rider
characters.author: Mariana Moreno / Peter Brockhammer
characters.rules_text: COME ON, LET'S DO THIS Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may ready another chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Wendy Darling
characters.subtitle: Courageous Captain
characters.author: French Carlomagno / Mariana Moreno
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) LOOK LIVELY, CREW! While you have another Pirate character in play, this character gets +1 and +1.

characters.name: John Silver
characters.subtitle: Ferocious Friend
characters.author: César Vergara
characters.rules_text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to another chosen character of yours. If you do, ready that character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz
characters.subtitle: Gutsy Go-Getter
characters.author: Arianna Rea
characters.flavor_text: Almost got it!
characters.rules_text: AS READY AS I'LL EVER BE At the start of your turn, if this character is at a location, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Michael Darling
characters.subtitle: Playful Swordsman
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: Hoist the colors! Prepare to fight! Teddy bear at the ready!

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Fearless Navigator
characters.author: Lava Hijzelaar
characters.flavor_text: Finding your way through the Azurite Sea takes a stout heart, plenty of courage, and more than a little luck.

characters.name: Markowski
characters.subtitle: Space Trooper
characters.author: Kevin Sidharta
characters.flavor_text: Just what we needed—a new place to fight bugs.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Abu
characters.subtitle: Bold Helmsman
characters.author: OggysonArt
characters.flavor_text: Port, Abu! Port! To the <left>! ABU! The other way! —Aladdin
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Courageous Sailor
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.flavor_text: Golly, this looked a lot easier from the ship. But I know I can make it—the crew is counting on me!
characters.rules_text: SOLID GROUND While this character is at a location, he gets +2.

characters.name: Adorabeezle Winterpop
characters.subtitle: Ice Rocket Racer
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: It'll take more than that to knock <me> out of the race!
characters.rules_text: KEEP DRIVING While this character has damage, she gets +1.

characters.name: Moana
characters.subtitle: Self-Taught Sailor
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: You wanna tell me I don’t know what I’m doing? I know I don’t!
characters.rules_text: LEARNING THE ROPES This character can't challenge unless you have a Captain character in play.

characters.name: John Darling
characters.subtitle: Sophisticated Swordsman
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: Get ready, Michael! Here they come!

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Intrepid Commander
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) REMEMBER YOUR TRAINING When you play this character, your characters get +2 this turn.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Pirate Lookout
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Minnie leaned forward. Could it be true? Was this the island at last?
characters.rules_text: LAND, HO! Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a location card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: Moana
characters.subtitle: Kakamora Leader
characters.author: Jared Mathews
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.) GATHERING FORCES When you play this character, you may move any number of your characters to the same location for free. Gain 1 lore for each character you moved.

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Freebooter
characters.author: Celeste Jamneck / Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: Pete was always looking for trouble. Now he was finally getting paid for it.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Flying Goof
characters.author: Kenneth Anderson
characters.flavor_text: Hold on to yer hat!
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Maui
characters.subtitle: Half-Shark
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) CHEEEEHOOOO! Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand. WAYFINDING Whenever you play an action, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Hades
characters.subtitle: Strong Arm
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.flavor_text: Panic, use your head for once!
characters.rules_text: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO? , 3 , Banish one of your characters — Banish chosen character.

characters.name: Tigger
characters.subtitle: In the Crow's Nest
characters.author: John Loren
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SWASH YOUR BUCKLES Whenever you play an action, this character gets +1 and +1 this turn.

characters.name: Scar
characters.subtitle: Heartless Hunter
characters.author: Cookie
characters.flavor_text: It’s for the greater good. I’m sure you understand. —Scar
characters.rules_text: TEETH AND AMBITIONS When you play this character, deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

characters.name: B.E.N.
characters.subtitle: Eccentric Robot
characters.author: Gwawi
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Aunt Cass
characters.subtitle: Biggest Fan
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: All right, geniuses, let's feed those hungry brains.
characters.rules_text: HAPPY TO HELP Whenever this character quests, chosen Inventor character gets +1 this turn.

characters.name: Gadget Hackwrench
characters.subtitle: Creative Thinker
characters.author: Andrea Femerstrand
characters.flavor_text: Golly, a perfect wingnut! There's about a million uses for that!
characters.rules_text: BRAINSTORM Whenever you play an item, this character gets +1 this turn.

characters.name: Gadget Hackwrench
characters.subtitle: Brilliant Bosun
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Gadget Hackwrench.) MECHANICALLY SAVVY While you have 3 or more items in play, you pay 1 less to play Inventor characters.

characters.name: Zipper
characters.subtitle: Astute Decoy
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) RUN INTERFERENCE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, another chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Oswald
characters.subtitle: The Lucky Rabbit
characters.author: Tom Bancroft / Kristen Breshears
characters.rules_text: FAVORABLE CHANCE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an item card, you may play that item for free and it enters play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Yokai
characters.subtitle: Enigmatic Inventor
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: TIME TO UPGRADE Whenever this character quests, you may return one of your items to your hand to pay 2 less for the next item you play this turn.

characters.name: Pleakley
characters.subtitle: Scientific Expert
characters.author: Heidi Neunhoffer
characters.flavor_text: As the duly appointed representative for the Galactic Council, I volunteer for this assignment!
characters.rules_text: REPORTING FOR DUTY When you play this character, put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Hiro Hamada
characters.subtitle: Robotics Prodigy
characters.author: Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: A couple more tweaks and I’ve just about... got it!
characters.rules_text: SWEET TECH , 2 — Search your deck for an item card or a Robot character card and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

characters.name: Heihei
characters.subtitle: Not-So-Tricky Chicken
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.rules_text: EAT ANYTHING When you play this character, exert chosen opposing item. It can't ready at the start of its next turn. OUT TO LUNCH During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Sour Bill
characters.subtitle: Surly Henchman
characters.author: Mike Mu / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: You want to go in there? Fine. If you do, you won’t come back out.
characters.rules_text: UNPALATABLE When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -2 this turn.

characters.name: Nick Wilde
characters.subtitle: Soggy Fox
characters.author: Lauren Barger
characters.flavor_text: Glad you could make it.
characters.rules_text: NICE TO HAVE A PARTNER While you have another character with Support in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Wasabi
characters.subtitle: Methodical Engineer
characters.author: Taraneh
characters.rules_text: BLADES OF FURY When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player gains 1 lore. QUICK REFLEXES During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Nick Wilde
characters.subtitle: Sly Fox
characters.author: João Moura
characters.rules_text: Shift 1 (You may pay 1 to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.) YOU CAN'T TOUCH ME While you have an item in play, this character can't be challenged.

characters.name: Gadget Hackwrench
characters.subtitle: Perceptive Mouse
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: All the clues pointed to an island, but I never thought I'd see it on a map. Golly, this is incredible! I mean, the island actually exists, so it’s technically credible—but still! This is amazing!

characters.name: Dr. Delbert Doppler
characters.subtitle: Fussy Astronomer
characters.author: Valentina Graziuso
characters.flavor_text: Of course! It all makes perfect sense. That’s why my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky here is different!

characters.name: Tadashi Hamada
characters.subtitle: Baymax Inventor
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: I'm not giving up on you. You don't understand this yet, but people need you.
characters.rules_text: LET'S GET BACK TO WORK This character gets +1 and +1 for each item you have in play.

characters.name: Hiro Hamada
characters.subtitle: Team Leader
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.rules_text: I NEED TO UPGRADE ALL OF YOU Your other Inventor characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.) SHAPE THE FUTURE 2 — Look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Tadashi Hamada
characters.subtitle: Gifted Roboticist
characters.author: Alibeth Zermeno
characters.flavor_text: His work lives on.
characters.rules_text: SOMEONE HAS TO HELP During an opponent's turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown.

characters.name: Baymax
characters.subtitle: Personal Healthcare Companion
characters.author: Jared Mathews
characters.rules_text: FULLY CHARGED If you have an Inventor character in play, you pay 1 less to play this character. YOU SAID 'OW' 2 — Remove up to 1 damage from another chosen character.

characters.name: Baymax
characters.subtitle: Armored Companion
characters.author: Brianna Garcia
characters.rules_text: THE TREATMENT IS WORKING When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from another chosen character of yours. Gain 1 lore for each 1 damage removed this way.

characters.name: Yokai
characters.subtitle: Professor Callaghan
characters.author: Jennifer Park
characters.flavor_text: You are all brilliant scientists and inventors. Think of what we could do with this little device. How do we push the boundaries of what is possible?

characters.name: Hiram Flaversham
characters.subtitle: Intrigued Inventor
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.flavor_text: He'll find a way to make anything mouse-sized.

characters.name: Yokai
characters.subtitle: Scientific Supervillain
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6 to play this on top of one of your characters named Yokai.) NEUROTRANSMITTER You may play items named Microbots for free. TECHNICAL GAIN Whenever this character quests, draw a card for each opposing character with 0.

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Savvy Sailor
characters.author: Dustin Panzino
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) AHOY! Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gets +1 and gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Kakamora
characters.subtitle: Long-Range Specialist
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.flavor_text: They’re very good at making trouble. —Maui
characters.rules_text: A LITTLE HELP When you play this character, if you have another Pirate character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

characters.name: Kakamora
characters.subtitle: Pirate Chief
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: HEAD COCONUT Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card to deal 1 damage to chosen character or location. If you discarded a Pirate character card, deal 3 damage instead.

characters.name: Jim Hawkins
characters.subtitle: Stubborn Cabin Boy
characters.author: Ursula Dorada
characters.rules_text: COME ON, COME ON, COME ON! During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, this character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Mr. Big
characters.subtitle: Shrewd Tycoon
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: You’ve done me a great service.
characters.rules_text: REPUTATION This character can't be challenged by characters with 2 or greater.

characters.name: Mr. Smee
characters.subtitle: Steadfast Mate
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: Captain Hook'd like a word with ya.
characters.rules_text: GOOD CATCH During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Mr. Smee
characters.subtitle: Captain of the Jolly Roger
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mr. Smee.) RAISE THE COLORS When you play this character, you may deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of your other Pirate characters in play.

characters.name: Mullins
characters.subtitle: Seasoned Shipmate
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: Anything for you, Mr. Smee! Except me share o' the plunder...
characters.rules_text: FALL IN LINE While you have a character named Mr. Smee in play, this character gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Kohut
characters.subtitle: Trusted Marine
characters.author: Kevin Sidharta
characters.flavor_text: Ma’am! I am a highly trained instrument of tactical superiority! Maybe we could find someone else for the gruntwork! Ma’am!

characters.name: King Hubert
characters.subtitle: Phillip's Father
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: I told you we’d find an island eventually! Excellent navigating. Yes, yes, I’m quite proud. Now, a toast to our success!

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: Unwavering Demigod
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: That maze wasn’t so bad! Let’s see what this island has in store for us.
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: John Silver
characters.subtitle: Ship's Cook
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: At the end of the day, it's the simplest tools that come through for you in a pinch.
characters.rules_text: HUNK OF HARDWARE When you play this character, chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

characters.name: Mr. Arrow
characters.subtitle: Legacy's First Mate
characters.author: Michela Cacciatore / Giulia Priori
characters.flavor_text: We’re holding steady, Captain. Despite this wind. And these waves.
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Jim Hawkins
characters.subtitle: Rigging Specialist
characters.author: Ornella Savarese
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Jim Hawkins.) BATTLE STATIONS When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

characters.name: Tuk Tuk
characters.subtitle: Big Buddy
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: Raya: Nothing gets past Tuk Tuk. <Nothing>. Sisu: Except butterflies! Oh, and birds! Raya: Fine. <Most> things don’t get past Tuk Tuk.

characters.name: Billy Bones
characters.subtitle: Space Sailor
characters.author: Diogo Saito
characters.flavor_text: He’ll be comin’ soon. Can’t let them find this.
characters.rules_text: KEEP IT HIDDEN When this character is banished, you may banish chosen item or location.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.subtitle: Guard Dog
characters.author: Hedvig Häggman-Sund
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) GOOD BOY While this character has no damage, he gets +4.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Night Watch
characters.author: Hedvig Häggman-Sund
characters.flavor_text: Gee, Donald was right—it’s spooky out here in the dark!
characters.rules_text: BACKUP Your characters named Pluto gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Cobra Bubbles
characters.subtitle: Former CIA
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) THINK ABOUT WHAT'S BEST 2 — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Gantu
characters.subtitle: Captain Crankyhead
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: Strength in numbers is overrated. I prefer my own strength.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Ham Hands
characters.author: Justin Runfola
characters.flavor_text: I'm very good at what I do. Probably the best I know.
characters.rules_text: I WRECK THINGS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item or location to gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Calhoun
characters.subtitle: Marine Sergeant
characters.author: Kevin Sidharta
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) LEVEL UP During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Captain Amelia
characters.subtitle: Commander of the Legacy
characters.author: French Carlomagno

characters.rules_text: ONE STEP BEHIND When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Shenzi
characters.subtitle: Head Hyena
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.rules_text: STICK AROUND FOR DINNER This character gets +1 for each other Hyena character you have in play. WHAT HAVE WE GOT HERE? Whenever one of your Hyena characters challenges a damaged character, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Mother Gothel
characters.subtitle: Unwavering Schemer
characters.author: Dylan Bonner
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mother Gothel.) THE WORLD IS DARK When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

characters.name: Scar
characters.subtitle: Vengeful Lion
characters.author: César Vergara
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) LIFE'S NOT FAIR, IS IT? Whenever one of your characters challenges a damaged character, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
characters.subtitle: Ruthless Rival
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: There’s not a glimmer that can keep up with me. You might as well quit now.

characters.name: Wreck-It Ralph
characters.subtitle: Demolition Dude
characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.rules_text: REFRESHING BREAK Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each 1 damage on him.

characters.name: Maximus
characters.subtitle: Team Champion
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: It's easy to get carried away when it comes to tug-of-war.
characters.rules_text: ROYALLY BIG REWARDS At the end of your turn, if you have any characters in play with 5 or more, gain 2 lore. If you have any in play with 10 or more, gain 5 lore instead.

characters.name: Turbo
characters.subtitle: Royal Hack
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) GAME JUMP This character also counts as being named King Candy for Shift.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Pie Slinger
characters.author: César Vergara
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) HUMBLE PIE When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, each opponent loses 2 lore. RAGING DUCK While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6.

characters.name: Rancis Fluggerbutter
characters.subtitle: Chocolate Charger
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: Ingredients: Butter, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, and arrogance.

characters.name: Scar
characters.subtitle: Betrayer
characters.author: Dinulescu Alexandru
characters.flavor_text: The second Rule of Villainy: Never settle for second place.
characters.rules_text: LONG LIVE THE KING When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Mufasa.

characters.name: Snowanna Rainbeau
characters.subtitle: Cool Competitor
characters.author: Simangaliso Sibaya
characters.flavor_text: When it comes to racing, she never gets cold feet.
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.subtitle: Spotless Food-Fighter
characters.author: Maddie Shilt
characters.flavor_text: She has an unblemished record.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Enthusiastic Dancer
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.flavor_text: He loves to share the spotlight with a star like Minnie.
characters.rules_text: PERFECT PARTNERS While you have a character named Minnie Mouse in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Ratigan
characters.subtitle: Raging Rat
characters.author: Adam Fenton
characters.flavor_text: The world’s most diabolical genius should never suffer such indignities!
characters.rules_text: NOTHING CAN STAND IN MY WAY While this character has damage, he gets +2.

characters.name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
characters.subtitle: Crowd Favorite
characters.author: Carlos Luzzi
characters.flavor_text: Never lose sight of where you’re going. Second place.
characters.rules_text: SHOWSTOPPER When you play this character, if you have a location in play, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Denahi
characters.subtitle: Avenging Brother
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.flavor_text: You'll pay for what you've done! I'll track you all the way to the Azurite Sea if I have to!

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Steamboat Rival
characters.author: Louis Jones
characters.rules_text: SCRAM! When you play this character, if you have another character named Pete in play, you may banish chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
characters.subtitle: Sour Speedster
characters.author: Jiahui Eva Gao
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Taffyta Muttonfudge.) NEW ROSTER Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Sharpshooter
characters.author: Federico Maria Cugliari
characters.rules_text: MY GREATEST PERFORMANCE Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an action card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest in your discard.

characters.name: Gaston
characters.subtitle: Pure Paragon
characters.author: Dave Alvarez / Livio Cacciatore
characters.rules_text: A MAN AMONG MEN! For each damaged character you have in play, you pay 2 less to play this character. Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Pastry Chomper
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: His half-baked scheme to whisk away the food almost worked. But in the end, he got his just desserts.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Novice Sparrow
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Hold it, boy. Not so fast. —Merlin
characters.rules_text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Daisy's Date
characters.author: Francesco D'ippolito / Giuseppe di Maio
characters.flavor_text: He keeps his eye on the prize.
characters.rules_text: PLUCKY PLAY Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Ratigan
characters.subtitle: Party Crasher
characters.author: Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ratigan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) DELIGHTFULLY WICKED Your damaged characters get +2.

characters.name: Vanellope von Schweetz
characters.subtitle: Random Roster Racer
characters.author: Hyuna Lee
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) PIXLEXIA When you play this character, she gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

characters.name: Simba
characters.subtitle: Adventurous Successor
characters.author: Valentin Palombo
characters.rules_text: I LAUGH IN THE FACE OF DANGER When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Dazzling Dancer
characters.author: Raquel Villanueva
characters.flavor_text: She doesn't seek the spotlight—the spotlight seeks her.
characters.rules_text: DANCE-OFF Whenever this character or one of your characters named Mickey Mouse challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: King Candy
characters.subtitle: Sovereign of Sugar
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.flavor_text: My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy.

characters.name: Chaca
characters.subtitle: Impressive Daughter
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Cruelest of All
characters.author: Carmine Pucci
characters.flavor_text: She'd seen what the ink could do for other glimmers. What could it do for her?
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Scrooge McDuck
characters.subtitle: Afficionado of Antiquities
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.flavor_text: The secret room should be right here! Ach, I cannot believe I paid a whole penny for this map.

characters.name: Prince John
characters.subtitle: Opportunistic Briber
characters.author: Carlos Gomes Cabral
characters.flavor_text: Of <course> I'm on the list. Check under 'PJ.'
characters.rules_text: TAXES NEVER FAIL ME Whenever you play an item, this character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Back from Bermuda
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: A little rest and relaxation will do wonders for your health, boy.
characters.rules_text: LONG LIVE THE KING! Your characters named Arthur gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Pacha
characters.subtitle: Emperor's Guide
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.rules_text: HELPFUL SUPPLIES At the start of your turn, If you have an item in play, gain 1 lore. PERFECT DIRECTIONS At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Fairest of All
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) REFLECTIONS OF VANITY For each other character named The Queen you have in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Sheriff of Nottingham
characters.subtitle: Bushel Britches
characters.author: Josep Solé
characters.rules_text: EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS For each item you have in play, you pay 1 less to play this character. Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Chicha
characters.subtitle: Dedicated Mother
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) ONE ON THE WAY During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it's the second card you've put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Prince John
characters.subtitle: Gold Lover
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: A villainous schemer from day to night.
characters.rules_text: BEAUTIFUL, LOVELY TAXES — Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Crown of the Council
characters.author: Lava Hijzelaar / Ellie Horie
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) GATHERER OF THE WICKED When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of character cards named The Queen and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Selfish Emperor
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.rules_text: OUTPLACEMENT When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted. BY INVITE ONLY 4 — Your other characters gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Mufasa
characters.subtitle: Ruler of Pride Rock
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.rules_text: A DELICATE BALANCE When you play this character, exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand. EVERYTHING THE LIGHT TOUCHES Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

characters.name: Ludwig von Drake
characters.subtitle: Self-Proclaimed Genius
characters.author: Matt Chapman
characters.flavor_text: So you see, there’s a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What’s it made of? I don’t know! The light’s just gone. Kaput!

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Quick-Thinking Inventor
characters.author: Lauren Levering
characters.flavor_text: This puts the Frosting Flinger 2000 to shame.
characters.rules_text: CAKE CATAPULT When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 this turn.

characters.name: Basil
characters.subtitle: Practiced Detective
characters.author: Eva Widermann
characters.flavor_text: This case is as good as solved! —Basil
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: King Candy
characters.subtitle: Sweet Abomination
characters.author: Jake Parker
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.) CHANGING THE CODE When you play this character, you may draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Focused Flatfoot
characters.author: Luigi Aimé
characters.flavor_text: There's just gotta be one of those chromi-thingies around here somewhere!
characters.rules_text: BAFFLING MYSTERY When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Tanana
characters.subtitle: Wise Woman
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: YOUR BROTHERS NEED GUIDANCE When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

characters.name: Tipo
characters.subtitle: Growing Son
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: Mom, Mom! I think I’m still growing!
characters.rules_text: MEASURE ME AGAIN When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Of the Ball
characters.author: French Carlomagno
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) USHERED INTO THE PARTY When you play this character, your other characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Intellectual Visionary
characters.author: Jake Parker
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.) OVERDEVELOPED BRAIN When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search your deck for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

characters.name: Stitch
characters.subtitle: Team Underdog
characters.author: Karen Hallion
characters.flavor_text: He’s not the biggest glimmer on the team, but he still packs a wallop.
characters.rules_text: HEAVE HO! When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Tyrannical Hypnotist
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.flavor_text: No one will keep me from the broken crown!
characters.rules_text: Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7.) INTIMIDATING GAZE Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge.

characters.name: Simba
characters.subtitle: Lost Prince
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.flavor_text: This is my kingdom. If I don’t fight for it, who will?
characters.rules_text: FACE THE PAST During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Rudy
characters.subtitle: Groove Disrupter
characters.author: Jon Densk / Hayley Evans
characters.flavor_text: The Illuminary can’t handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it’ll fall apart for sure!

characters.name: Royal Guard
characters.subtitle: Bovine Protector
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: Hey, I've been turned into a cow. Can I go home?

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Food Fight Defender
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: Underestimating him is a recipe for disaster.
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Sleepy
characters.subtitle: Sluggish Knight
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Kronk
characters.subtitle: Unlicensed Investigator
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.flavor_text: Maybe <this> one's a chromicon. Probably not. I really should have paid more attention when that wizard guy was talking...
characters.rules_text: Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1.)

characters.name: HeiHei
characters.subtitle: Protective Rooster
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Who’s the boat snack now?!
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Sneezy
characters.subtitle: Noisy Knight
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: HEADWIND When you play this character, chosen Knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Dopey
characters.subtitle: Knight Apprentice
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: STRONGER TOGETHER When you play this character, if you have another Knight character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

characters.name: Namaari
characters.subtitle: Resolute Daughter
characters.author: Jenna Gray
characters.rules_text: I DON'T HAVE ANY OTHER CHOICE For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2 less to play this character. Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

characters.name: Snow White
characters.subtitle: Fair-Hearted
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: Friendship is the best armor of all.
characters.rules_text: NATURAL LEADER This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Unjustly Treated
characters.author: Carlos Gomes Cabral
characters.flavor_text: What do you mean, 'not on the list'?! I told you to <always> put me on the list!
characters.rules_text: I'M WARNING YOU! During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Kronk
characters.subtitle: Head of Security
characters.author: Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.) ARE YOU ON THE LIST? During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

characters.name: Grumpy
characters.subtitle: Skeptical Knight
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: BOON OF RESILIENCE While one of your Knight characters is at a location, that character gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.) BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Pete
characters.subtitle: Wrestling Champ
characters.author: Rianti Hidayat
characters.flavor_text: He'll have you seeing double.
characters.rules_text: RE-PETE – Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.

characters.name: Sir Ector
characters.subtitle: Castle Lord
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Well, by Jove. Don’t just stand there. Raise a glass to my son Kay . . . and may we be rid of the trickster wizard Marvin, or whatever his blasted name was.

characters.name: Bashful
characters.subtitle: Adoring Knight
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.rules_text: IMPRESS THE PRINCESS While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Wart
characters.author: Kasia Brzezinska
characters.flavor_text: That boy's got real spark. Lots of spirit. Throws himself heart and soul into everything he does. —Merlin

characters.rules_text: BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.rules_text: Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.) IT'S BEAUTIFUL, NO? When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

characters.name: Daisy Duck

characters.author: Stefano Zanchi
characters.flavor_text: Sweet Daisy, the fairest duck I ever met Each flaxen lock a rush of flowing gold Her bill the color of summer sunset Exquisite plumes, a wonder to behold

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.subtitle: Musketeer Spy
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: She has a talent for thwarting hidden schemes.

characters.name: Félix Madrigal

characters.rules_text: STOLEN AWAY At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a song this turn, banish this character.

characters.name: Julieta Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Excellent Cook
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: Eat this, mi amor.
characters.rules_text: SIGNATURE RECIPE When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character. If you removed damage this way, you may draw a card.

characters.author: Stefano Zanchi

characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) SAVING THE MIRACLE Whenever this character quests, your other Madrigal characters get +1 this turn.

characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Eric.) UNDER VANESSA'S SPELL While you have a character named Ursula in play, this character gains Bodyguard and gets +2. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.rules_text: Shift: Discard a song card (You may discard a song card to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.) VANESSA'S DESIGN Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Vanessa
characters.author: Angela Simpson

characters.name: Antonio Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Animal Expert

characters.flavor_text: Once upon a time, there was a casita in the mountains with a very special family....

characters.author: Malia Ewart

characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.) ENHANCED HEALING When you play this character, move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU JUST HAVE TO SEE IT — Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand and gain 3 lore. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Camilo Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Prankster

LEAVE IT TO ME Whenever this character quests, your other characters can't quest for the rest of this turn.

characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, your characters gain Evasive until the start of your next turn.

characters.flavor_text: Never underestimate the power of a Goof.

characters.flavor_text: Nice catch, Jerkules. —Village boy

TRIPLE SHOT During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

characters.flavor_text: He sent the eels away when they came with the sea witch's offer. He didn't need her help making trouble.

characters.name: Noi
