characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.flavor_text: Come on—what's the worst that can happen?
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) BRING ON THE HEAT! When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 1 or less.

characters.name: Sisu
characters.subtitle: Emboldened Warrior
characters.author: LadyShalirin
characters.flavor_text: Sometimes the only way to fight the unimaginable is with the incredible.
characters.rules_text: SURGE OF POWER This character gets +1 for each card in opponents' hands.

characters.name: Sisu
characters.subtitle: Empowered Sibling
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6 to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.) I GOT THIS! When you play this character, banish all opposing characters with 2 or less.

characters.name: Tong
characters.subtitle: Survivor
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.flavor_text: I too wish to join this fellowship of Druun butt-kickery.
characters.rules_text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

characters.name: Tuk Tuk
characters.subtitle: Lively Partner
characters.author: Sandra Rios
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ON A ROLL When you play this character, you may move him and one of your other characters to the same location for free. The other character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Braving the Storm
characters.author: Maria Dresden
characters.flavor_text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.
characters.rules_text: I WAS BORN READY If you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: True-Hearted
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Make sure you know what’s truly important and be willing to fight for it.
characters.rules_text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Treasure Collector
characters.author: Miss Tania Soler
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) THE GIRL WHO HAS EVERYTHING While you have more items in play than each opponent, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Lore Guardian
characters.author: Koni
characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) PRESERVER Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects. ROYAL INVENTORY one of your items — Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.subtitle: Tranquil Princess
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: Her music fills the Illuminary’s gardens with joy and light.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

characters.name: Dang Hu
characters.subtitle: Talon Chief
characters.author: Rudy Hill
characters.flavor_text: You can find villainy in the most unexpected places.
characters.rules_text: YOU BETTER TALK FAST Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Fa Li
characters.subtitle: Mulan’s Mother
characters.author: Sarah Schmidt
characters.flavor_text: When far from home, Mulan often thinks of her calming presence.

characters.name: Flounder
characters.subtitle: Collector’s Companion
characters.author: James C Mulligan
characters.flavor_text: Ariel, Ariel! You won't believe what I found!
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) I'M NOT A GUPPY If you have a character named Ariel in play, you pay 1 less to play this character.

characters.name: Hades
characters.subtitle: Meticulous Plotter
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.flavor_text: This neat little scheme has Ursula's tentacles all over it. That sneaky sea witch... Wait! I can use this. She can keep those obnoxious Illumineers busy while I roll out my own plan.

characters.name: Hans
characters.subtitle: Noble Scoundrel
characters.author: Dustin Panzino / Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula—all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.
characters.rules_text: ROYAL SCHEMES When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Iduna
characters.subtitle: Caring Mother
characters.author: Jake Murphy
characters.flavor_text: Come my darling, homeward bound When all is lost, then all is found.
characters.rules_text: ENDURING LOVE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: John Silver
characters.subtitle: Terror of the Realm
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Strange things be at the edge of the map: sea witches, entangled glimmers, and whatnot. I’ll stay with me ship, thank you.

characters.name: Olaf
characters.subtitle: Carrot Enthusiast
characters.author: Lauren Levering
characters.rules_text: Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.) CARROTS ALL AROUND! Whenever he quests, each of your other characters gets + equal to this character’s this turn.

characters.name: Olaf
characters.subtitle: Trusting Companion
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.flavor_text: Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way, he'll be caught in that storm!
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character’s this turn.)

characters.name: Pascal
characters.subtitle: Inquisitive Pet
characters.author: Noukah
characters.flavor_text: If you want to find something hidden, get someone who’s an expert at hiding.
characters.rules_text: COLORFUL TACTICS When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

characters.name: Prince Phillip
characters.subtitle: Gallant Defender
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) BEST DEFENSE Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: Appreciative Artist
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: Pascal! A new flower for the wall!
characters.rules_text: PERCEPTIVE PARTNER While you have a character named Pascal in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

characters.name: Scuttle
characters.subtitle: Expert on Humans
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: Wow. This is special. This is very, very unusual.
characters.rules_text: LET ME SEE When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Sisu
characters.subtitle: Wise Friend
characters.author: Roger Pérez / Hayley Evans
characters.flavor_text: It may feel impossible, but sometimes, you just have to take the first step, even before you’re ready.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Diviner
characters.author: Mel Milton
characters.rules_text: CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Transformed Chef
characters.subtitle: Castle Stove
characters.author: James C Mulligan
characters.flavor_text: A good, hot meal will set you right as rain. —Mrs. Potts
characters.rules_text: A CULINARY MASTERPIECE When you play this character, remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Triton
characters.subtitle: Champion of Atlantica
characters.author: Erin Shin
characters.rules_text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6 to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.) IMPOSING PRESENCE Opposing characters get -1 for each location you have in play.

characters.name: Triton
characters.subtitle: Discerning King
characters.author: Diogo Saito
characters.flavor_text: If this is the only way, so be it.
characters.rules_text: CONSIGN TO THE DEPTHS , Banish one of your items — Gain 3 lore.

characters.name: Triton
characters.subtitle: Young Prince
characters.author: Malia Ewart
characters.rules_text: SUPERIOR SWIMMER During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.) KEEPER OF ATLANTICA Whenever one of your locations is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

characters.name: Tuk Tuk
characters.subtitle: Curious Partner
characters.author: Oggy Christiansson
characters.flavor_text: Some say he's easily distracted. They're not wrong... —Raya

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Brave Rescuer
characters.author: Randy Bishop
characters.rules_text: Shift: Discard a location card (You may discard a location card to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) CRASHING THROUGH Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.

characters.name: Aladdin
characters.subtitle: Resolute Swordsman
characters.author: Randy Bishop
characters.flavor_text: How about we cut to the part where I make a quick escape and you yell after me? No? Can’t say I didn’t give you a chance.

characters.name: Arges
characters.subtitle: The Cyclops
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Looks like you got some big feelings there, buddy—let's stomp ’em out! —Hades

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Determined Mermaid
characters.author: Dylan Bonner
characters.flavor_text: Everything she’s ever wanted is almost in reach.
characters.rules_text: I WANT MORE Whenever you play a song, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Sonic Warrior
characters.author: Marcel Berg
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.) AMPLIFIED VOICE Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2 to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Beast
characters.subtitle: Thick-Skinned
characters.author: Simangaliso Sibaya
characters.flavor_text: He's even tougher than he looks.
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: Chi-Fu
characters.subtitle: Imperial Advisor
characters.author: Gaku Kumatori
characters.flavor_text: You, there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor.
characters.rules_text: OVERLY CAUTIOUS While this character has no damage, he gets +2.

characters.name: Chien-Po
characters.subtitle: Imperial Soldier
characters.author: Michela Cacciatore / Giulia Priori
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Buccaneer
characters.author: Federico M. Cugliari
characters.flavor_text: Nobody stands a chance against the daring duck of the high seas!
characters.rules_text: BOARDING PARTY During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: Beloved Hero
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

characters.name: LeFou
characters.subtitle: Opportunistic Flunky
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.rules_text: I LEARNED FROM THE BEST During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

characters.name: Li Shang
characters.subtitle: Imperial Captain
characters.author: Carlos Ruiz
characters.flavor_text: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon—the Empire's finest warrior.

characters.name: Ling
characters.subtitle: Imperial Soldier
characters.author: Michela Cacciatore / Giulia Priori
characters.flavor_text: A good friend is handy in a fight.
characters.rules_text: FULL OF SPIRIT Your Hero characters get +1.

characters.name: Luisa Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Rock of the Family
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.
characters.rules_text: I'M THE STRONG ONE While you have another character in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Magic Broom
characters.subtitle: Aerial Cleaner
characters.author: Alibeth Zermeno
characters.flavor_text: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.
characters.rules_text: WINGED FOR A DAY During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.name: Magic Broom
characters.subtitle: Brigade Commander
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) ARMY OF BROOMS This character gets +2 for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Playful Sorcerer
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Standard Bearer
characters.author: Mariana Moreno
characters.flavor_text: He sets the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.
characters.rules_text: STAND STRONG When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 while challenging.)

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Armored Fighter
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.flavor_text: Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right, so when I looked in the mirror, I’d see someone worthwhile.

characters.name: Philoctetes
characters.subtitle: No-Nonsense Instructor
characters.author: Stefano Spagnuolo
characters.rules_text: YOU GOTTA STAY FOCUSED Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 while challenging.) SHAMELESS PROMOTER Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Piglet
characters.subtitle: Sturdy Swordsman
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) NOT SO SMALL ANYMORE While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

characters.name: Rajah
characters.subtitle: Royal Protector
characters.author: Sandara Tang
characters.flavor_text: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful.
characters.rules_text: STEADY GAZE While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge this character.

characters.name: Raya
characters.subtitle: Unstoppable Force
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) YOU GAVE IT YOUR BEST During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Yao
characters.subtitle: Imperial Soldier
characters.author: Michela Cacciatore / Giulia Priori
characters.flavor_text: I'm gonna hit you so hard, it'll make your ancestors dizzy.
characters.rules_text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2.)

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.subtitle: Melody Weaver
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.rules_text: Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.) BEAUTIFUL VOICE Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Musketeer Champion
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) DRAMATIC ENTRANCE When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 5 or more.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Sea Witch Queen
characters.author: John Loren / Nicholas Kole
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.) NOW I AM THE RULER! Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character. YOU'LL LISTEN TO ME! Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

characters.name: Yen Sid
characters.subtitle: Powerful Sorcerer
characters.author: Alan Batson
characters.rules_text: TIMELY INTERVENTION When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card. ARCANE STUDY While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Diablo
characters.subtitle: Devoted Herald
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.rules_text: Shift: Discard an action card (You may discard an action card to play this on top of one of your characters named Diablo.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) CIRCLE FAR AND WIDE During each opponent's turn, whenever they draw a card while this character is exerted, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Jasmine
characters.subtitle: Desert Warrior
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.rules_text: CUNNING MANEUVER When you play this character and whenever she’s challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Goofy
characters.subtitle: Super Goof
characters.author: Sam Nielson
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) SUPER PEANUT POWERS Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Sisu
characters.subtitle: Empowered Sibling
characters.author: João Moura
characters.rules_text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6 to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.) I GOT THIS! When you play this character, banish all opposing characters with 2 or less.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: True-Hearted
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.rules_text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Diviner
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.rules_text: CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Ariel
characters.subtitle: Sonic Warrior
characters.author: noc4urne
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.) AMPLIFIED VOICE Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2 to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

characters.name: Piglet
characters.subtitle: Sturdy Swordsman
characters.author: Simangaliso Sibaya
characters.rules_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) NOT SO SMALL ANYMORE While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

characters.name: Yen Sid
characters.subtitle: Powerful Sorcerer
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.rules_text: TIMELY INTERVENTION When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card. ARCANE STUDY While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Elite Archer
characters.author: Nicola Saviori
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) STRAIGHT SHOOTER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3 this turn. TRIPLE SHOT During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Playful Sorcerer
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Leader of the Band
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.) STRIKE UP THE MUSIC When you play this character, chosen character gains Support this turn.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Enemy of Entanglement
characters.author: Jared Mathews
characters.flavor_text: Ursula’s messengers fled, leaving behind tendrils of dark ink.
characters.rules_text: TIME TO SHINE Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Sea Witch Queen
characters.author: John Loren
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.) NOW I AM THE RULER! Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character. YOU'LL LISTEN TO ME! Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

characters.name: Flotsam & Jetsam
characters.subtitle: Entangling Eels
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.rules_text: Shift: Discard 2 cards (You may discard 2 cards to play this on top of one of your characters named Flotsam or Jetsam.) (This character counts as being named both Flotsam and Jetsam.)

characters.name: Bruno Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Undetected Uncle
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU JUST HAVE TO SEE IT — Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand and gain 3 lore. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Playful Sorcerer
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

characters.name: Anna
characters.subtitle: Ensnared Sister
characters.author: Dustin Panzino
characters.flavor_text: Ah, royalty! So pretty. So naive. So utterly impressionable. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Bruno Madrigal
characters.subtitle: Unspeakable Seer
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.flavor_text: His particular talents have already come in quite handy. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: DARK PROPHECY When you play this character, each opposing player puts the top 3 cards of their deck into their discard.

characters.name: Captain Hook
characters.subtitle: Devious Duelist
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: An obvious choice, of course. So full of treachery and deceit. He reminds me of... me. —Ursula

characters.name: Flotsam
characters.subtitle: Wicked Defender
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: My darling baby, always so protective. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) URSULA’S SENTRY This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Gaston
characters.subtitle: Egotistical Bully
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: POSITIVELY PRIMEVAL When you play this character, deal 4 damage to the opposing character with the lowest cost. (If there’s a tie, the opposing players choose from the tied characters.)

characters.name: HeiHei
characters.subtitle: Peckish Pal
characters.author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: He doesn’t know why he’s here. Neither does Ursula.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Hercules
characters.subtitle: Manipulated Hero
characters.author: Mario Oscar Gabriele
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) URSULA’S SENTRY This character enters play exerted. EVERYTHING HAS A PRICE During the opposing players’ turn, they may together pay 3 lore to banish this character.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Double-Crossing Vizier
characters.author: Ilaria Sposetti
characters.flavor_text: With such a strong will, he was difficult to entangle. But I always get my way in the end. —Ursula

characters.name: Jetsam
characters.subtitle: Wicked Whisperer
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: My little poopsie can sway even the most stubborn glimmers. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: URSULA HAS GREAT POWERS When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

characters.name: Mad Hatter
characters.subtitle: Sinister Host
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: He’s simply <wild> for parties. He’s already celebrating my victory! —Ursula

characters.name: Magica De Spell
characters.subtitle: Shadowy Sorceress
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: Her quaint spells are little more than trifles compared to my own. Still, she does have her uses. —Ursula

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Wild-Eyed Diver
characters.author: Gonzalo Kenny
characters.flavor_text: The first—and best—of my entangled glimmers. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: CONFUSING PRESENCE When you play this character, each opposing player loses 2 lore.

characters.name: Prince Eric
characters.subtitle: Grim Groom
characters.author: Jared Nickerl
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) URSULA’S SENTRY This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Shark
characters.subtitle: Toothy Terror
characters.author: Jared Nickerl
characters.flavor_text: He loves a problem he can sink his teeth into. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: BIG BULLY When you play this character, deal 2 damage to each opposing damaged character.

characters.name: Tamatoa
characters.subtitle: Grabby Crab
characters.author: Luigi Aimé
characters.flavor_text: It’s called a distraction, angelfish. Look it up. —Ursula
characters.rules_text: PICK ONE! When you play this character, the opposing players together choose an item or location of theirs and banish it.

characters.name: Triton's Daughters
characters.subtitle: Discordant Chorus
characters.author: Jenna Gray
characters.flavor_text: Perhaps I should have taken their voices, too. Well, there’s always time for that later. —Ursula

characters.name: Baloo
characters.subtitle: von Bruinwald XIII
characters.author: Cam Kendell
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) LET'S MAKE LIKE A TREE When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

characters.name: Bernard
characters.subtitle: Brand-New Agent
characters.author: Jacob McAlister

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q:	At the end of my turn I have 2 Bernard – Brand New Agents in play and both are exerted. If I use the first Bernard to ready the second one, can I still use the second one’s I’ll Check It Out ability?
A:	No. Bernard must be exerted when his ability is used.

characters.flavor_text: You stay there. I'll look for scattered lore.
characters.rules_text: I'LL CHECK IT OUT At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

characters.name: Chernabog
characters.subtitle: Evildoer
characters.author: Evana Kisa / Jochem van Gool

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q:	If I have 10 character cards in my discard, can I use Perdita – Devoted Mother’s ability Come Along, Children to play Chernabog – Evildoer from my discard?
A:	No. Chernabog’s ability The Power of Evil only affects how much ink you must pay to play him, not his cost. Even if you have 10 character cards in your discard, Chernabog – Evildoer still has a cost of 10.

characters.flavor_text: Darkness calls to minions everywhere.
characters.rules_text: THE POWER OF EVIL For each character card in your discard, you pay 1 less to play this character. SUMMON THE SPIRITS When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Dalmatian Puppy
characters.subtitle: Tail Wagger
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
characters.rules_text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy – Tail Wagger in your deck.

characters.name: Joshua Sweet
characters.subtitle: The Doctor
characters.author: Jeanne Plounevez
characters.flavor_text: Heading out to the Inklands? Come on back if you need patching up.
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Kida
characters.subtitle: Atlantean
characters.author: Nicoletta Baldari
characters.flavor_text: Welcome to the Inklands!

characters.name: Kida
characters.subtitle: Protector of Atlantis
characters.author: Adam Fenton

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: During my turn I play Kida – Protector of Atlantis. During my opponent’s next turn, if they play Maui – Hero to All, does he also have -3 Strength?
A: No. Kida’s ability Perhaps We Can Save Our Future applies only to characters in play when she’s played.

characters.flavor_text: She has been chosen. —King Kashekim Nedakh
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.) PERHAPS WE CAN SAVE OUR FUTURE When you play this character, all characters get -3 until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Lucky
characters.subtitle: The 15th Puppy
characters.author: Brian Weisz

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I use Lucky – The 15th Puppy’s ability Good As New and reveal 2 characters with cost 2 or less. Can I choose to add only 1 of the characters to my hand?
A: No. When choosing which cards to add to your hand with Lucky’s Good As New ability, you must add either all cost 2 or lower characters revealed or none of them.

characters.rules_text: GOOD AS NEW — Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. PUPPY LOVE Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.subtitle: Musical Artist
characters.author: Erika Wiseman
characters.flavor_text: Her musical talents are off the charts!
characters.rules_text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.) ENTOURAGE Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Miss Bianca
characters.subtitle: Rescue Aid Society Agent
characters.author: Jeff Merghart
characters.flavor_text: Our society has never failed to answer a call for help. —Mr. Chairman
characters.rules_text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

characters.name: Mr. Snoops
characters.subtitle: Inept Businessman
characters.author: Alexandria Neonakis
characters.flavor_text: This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond! —Madame Medusa

characters.name: Nani
characters.subtitle: Protective Sister
characters.author: Shannon Hallstein
characters.flavor_text: Let me handle this, Lilo.
characters.rules_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

characters.name: Orville
characters.subtitle: Ace Pilot
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: Boy, look at those things go! Whaddaya call 'em? Inkrunners? I wish I could fly like that.

characters.name: Patch
characters.subtitle: Intimidating Pup
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: Just like Thunderbolt, he’ll stand up to any bad guy.
characters.rules_text: BARK — Chosen character gets -2 until the start of your next turn.

characters.name: Perdita
characters.subtitle: Devoted Mother
characters.author: Defne Tözüm / Livio Cacciatore

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If I use Perdita – Devoted Mother’s ability Come Along, Children and play Madam Mim – Snake from my discard pile, do I still have to return a character to my hand from play or banish Madam Mim?
A: Yes. Perdita’s ability Come Along, Children only plays a character without requiring you to play their ink cost. All abilities that apply when you play that character still apply.

characters.flavor_text: Her pups will follow her anywhere.
characters.rules_text: COME ALONG, CHILDREN When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.

characters.name: Piglet
characters.subtitle: Pooh Pirate Captain
characters.author: Grace Tran
characters.flavor_text: Ahoy! There’s lore out there, and I’m g-gonna find it!
characters.rules_text: AND I'M THE CAPTAIN! While you have 2 or more other characters in play, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.subtitle: Determined Defender
characters.author: Dave Alvarez / Alice Pisoni

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I choose not to remove any damage from Pluto – Determined Defender at the start of my turn?
A: Yes. Although you can’t choose not to use Pluto’s Guard Dog ability, you can use it to remove any amount of damage from Pluto, from 0 to 3. 

Q: If I play Pluto – Determined Defender using his Shift ability, can I use his Bodyguard ability to have him enter play exerted?
A: Yes.

characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Pluto.) Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) GUARD DOG At the start of your turn, remove up to 3 damage from this character.

characters.name: Pluto
characters.subtitle: Friendly Pooch
characters.author: Jiahui Eva Gao

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I use Pluto – Friendly Pooch’s Good Dog ability to reduce the Shift cost of a character?
A: Yes. Note that if you shift a character onto an exerted Pluto – Friendly Pooch, the new character will enter play exerted.

characters.flavor_text: He just can't wait for new friends to arrive!
characters.rules_text: GOOD DOG — You pay 1 less for the next character you play this turn.

characters.name: Pongo
characters.subtitle: Determined Father
characters.author: Grace Tran

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If I have 3 copies of Pongo – Determined Father in play, how many times can I use his Twilight Bark ability?
A: 3 times. You can use the Twilight Bark ability of each copy of Pongo – Determined Father. Note that if you return a Pongo to your hand and then play it again, you can use his Twilight Bark ability again.

characters.flavor_text: We’ll find our way. I know we will!
characters.rules_text: TWILIGHT BARK Once per turn, you may pay 2 to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Queen of Hearts
characters.subtitle: Wonderland Empress
characters.author: Brianna Garcia
characters.flavor_text: The more of the Inklands she claims, the more she wants.
characters.rules_text: ALL WAYS HERE ARE MY WAYS Whenever this character quests, your other Villain characters get +1 this turn.

characters.name: Rolly
characters.subtitle: Hungry Pup
characters.author: Defne Tözüm / Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: I’m hungry, Mother. I really am.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Tinker Bell
characters.subtitle: Generous Fairy
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.flavor_text: Plenty of berries—and friendship—to go around.
characters.rules_text: MAKE A NEW FRIEND When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

characters.name: Wendy Darling
characters.subtitle: Talented Sailor
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: With Tink’s upgrades in place, Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid.

characters.name: Alice
characters.subtitle: Tea Alchemist
characters.author: Nicola Saviori / Raquel Villanueva
characters.flavor_text: With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest.
characters.rules_text: CURIOUSER AND CURIOUSER — Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

characters.name: Chernabog's Followers
characters.subtitle: Creatures of Evil
characters.author: Monica Catalano
characters.flavor_text: Let chaos reign.
characters.rules_text: RESTLESS SOULS Whenever this character quests, you may banish them to draw a card.

characters.name: Diablo
characters.subtitle: Faithful Pet
characters.author: Agnes Christianson
characters.flavor_text: With a little ink-enhanced magic, nothing escapes his sight.
characters.rules_text: LOOKING FOR AURORA Whenever you play a character named Maleficent, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Genie
characters.subtitle: Supportive Friend
characters.author: Koni
characters.flavor_text: Right here, direct from the lamp, right here for your very much wish fulfillment.
characters.rules_text: THREE WISHES Whenever this character quests, you may shuffle this card into your deck to draw 3 cards.

characters.name: Hydros
characters.subtitle: Ice Titan
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Freeze Zeus!
characters.rules_text: BLIZZARD — Exert chosen character.

characters.name: Iago
characters.subtitle: Pretty Polly
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.flavor_text: Your majesty certainly has a way with dumb animals. —Jafar
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Lamp Thief
characters.author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: I will rule as far as the eye can see.
characters.rules_text: I AM YOUR MASTER NOW When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

characters.name: Jafar
characters.subtitle: Striking Illusionist
characters.author: Nicola Saviori

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If my Jafar – Striking Illusionist sings Friends on the Other Side, do I gain 2 lore due to his Power Beyond Measure ability?
A: Yes. Exerting a character is the cost to have that character sing a song, so Jafar will already be exerted when the effect of Friends on the Other Side has you draw 2 cards.

Q: During my turn, I exerted my Jafar – Striking Illusionist to quest with him. When I draw a card at the beginning of my next turn, do I gain 1 lore from Jafar’s ability Power Beyond Measure?
A: No. The first thing players do at the beginning of their turn is ready their exerted cards. By the time you draw a card at the start of your turn, Jafar will be ready and you won’t be able to use his Power Beyond Measure ability until he’s exerted again.

characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) POWER BEYOND MEASURE During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Lena Sabrewing
characters.subtitle: Rebellious Teenager
characters.author: Heidi Neunhoffer
characters.flavor_text: Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship.
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.name: Magic Broom
characters.subtitle: Dancing Duster
characters.author: Giulia Riva

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I choose an exerted character for the Power Clean ability of Magic Broom – Dancing Duster?
A: Yes. Note that the chosen character still can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.flavor_text: Super-smooth tidiness.
characters.rules_text: POWER CLEAN When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Magic Broom
characters.subtitle: Swift Cleaner
characters.author: Cristian Romero

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: What cards are shuffled back into the deck by the Clean This, Clean That ability of Magic Broom – Swift Cleaner?
A: A Broom card is any card that has “Broom” in its classifications.

characters.flavor_text: Super-speedy tidiness.
characters.rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) CLEAN THIS, CLEAN THAT When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.

characters.name: Magic Broom
characters.subtitle: The Big Sweeper
characters.author: Eri Welli
characters.flavor_text: Super-sized tidiness.
characters.rules_text: CLEAN SWEEP While this character is at a location, it gets +2.

characters.name: Magic Carpet
characters.subtitle: Flying Rug
characters.author: Cory Godbey

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I use Magic Carpet – Flying Rug’s Find the Way ability to move a character of mine to an opposing location?
A: No.

characters.flavor_text: Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back before anyone knows it!%—Aladdin
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) FIND THE WAY — Move a character of yours to a location for free.

characters.name: Magica De Spell
characters.subtitle: Ambitious Witch
characters.author: Lissette Carrera
characters.flavor_text: Feed my power, Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain, the Shadow Queen be whole again!

characters.name: Magica De Spell
characters.subtitle: The Midas Touch
characters.author: Lauren Levering

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a Lucky Dime and a Pawpsicle in play. When I quest with Magica De Spell – The Midas Touch, how much lore do I gain?
A: When you quest with Magica De Spell – The Midas Touch, her All Mine ability has you pick one of your items and gain lore equal to its cost. Because Magica has 0 {L}, you don’t gain any lore from her quest itself, only from her ability. So in this example you can choose to gain either 1 or 7 lore.

characters.flavor_text: I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.) ALL MINE Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.

characters.name: Magica De Spell
characters.subtitle: Thieving Sorceress
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.flavor_text: Do you know what I call this? A good start!
characters.rules_text: TELEKINESIS — Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's to its player's hand.

characters.name: Maleficent
characters.subtitle: Mistress of All Evil
characters.author: Grace Tran

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a Beast – Tragic Hero with 4 damage and a Maleficent – Mistress of All Evil in play, and my opponent only has a Flounder – Voice of Reason. If I play A Whole New World and draw 7 cards, can I move all 4 damage counters from Beast to Flounder using Maleficent’s Divination ability?
A: No. You may use Maleficent’s Divination ability every time you draw a card. If you draw multiple cards at the same time, you have that many opportunities to use the ability. After you move 2 damage counters to Flounder, who has 2 {W}, he’ll be banished. Note that when you use Maleficent’s Divination ability while there are no opposing characters in play, you won’t be able to move any damage counters, so the ability will resolve without doing anything.

characters.rules_text: DARK KNOWLEDGE Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card DIVINATION During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Mama Odie
characters.subtitle: Voice of Wisdom
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: That’s the way to give it what it needs, Juju!
characters.rules_text: LISTEN TO YOUR MAMA NOW Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Pua
characters.subtitle: Potbellied Buddy
characters.author: Denny Minonne
characters.flavor_text: Always ready to lend a hand... er, snout.
characters.rules_text: ALWAYS THERE When this character is banished, you may shuffle this card into your deck.

characters.name: Rafiki
characters.subtitle: Mystical Fighter
characters.author: Otto Paredes
characters.flavor_text: Mind the stick!
characters.rules_text: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3.) ANCIENT SKILLS Whenever he challenges a Hyena character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

characters.name: Stratos
characters.subtitle: Tornado Titan
characters.author: Jared Nickerl / Alice Pisoni
characters.flavor_text: Blow Zeus away!
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) CYCLONE — Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.

characters.name: The Firebird
characters.subtitle: Force of Destruction
characters.author: Hedvig Häggman-Sund
characters.flavor_text: It rages through the forest, Wings spread wide with flame Spring sings its ancient chorus And green renews its claim

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Hateful Rival
characters.author: Anna Rud / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: A cobweb’s strand to hold her fast An eagle’s eye to see her well Sands of time to steal her past Thus I cast my magic spell!

characters.name: Treasure Guardian
characters.subtitle: Protector of the Cave
characters.author: Hedvig Häggman-Sund
characters.flavor_text: Only one may enter here.
characters.rules_text: WHO DISTURBS MY SLUMBER? This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Sea Witch
characters.author: John Loren

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: When I use Ursula – Sea Witch’s ability You’re Too Late, can I choose a ready character?
A: Yes. Note that Ursula’s ability You’re Too Late doesn’t exert the character. It only prevents them from readying if they’re exerted.

characters.flavor_text: The secret contract has already been written.
characters.rules_text: YOU'RE TOO LATE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

characters.name: Cubby
characters.subtitle: Mighty Lost Boy
characters.author: Wouter Bruneel
characters.flavor_text: With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff.
characters.rules_text: THE BEAR Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3 this turn.

characters.name: Cursed Merfolk
characters.subtitle: Ursula's Handiwork
characters.author: Massimiliano Narciso / Marieke Ferrari
characters.flavor_text: Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price....%—Ursula
characters.rules_text: POOR SOULS Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Don Karnage
characters.subtitle: Prince of Pirates
characters.author: Luis Huerta
characters.flavor_text: You didn’t expect to find <me> here, did you? Well neither did I.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.name: Flotsam
characters.subtitle: Riffraff
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.flavor_text: Ursula needs lore to complete her plan....
characters.rules_text: EERIE PAIR Your characters named Jetsam get +3.

characters.name: Friar Tuck
characters.subtitle: Priest of Nottingham
characters.author: Denny Minonne

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I’m playing a 2-player game and have 4 cards in my hand. My opponent has 3 cards in their hand. If I play Friar Tuck – Priest of Nottingham, who has to discard a card?
A: Both you and your opponent. Once you’ve played Friar Tuck and can use his You Thieving Scoundrel ability, you have 3 cards in your hand. You and your opponent are tied for having the most cards in your hand.

characters.flavor_text: Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!
characters.rules_text: YOU THIEVING SCOUNDREL When you play this character, the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Helga Sinclair
characters.subtitle: Femme Fatale
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.) THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING Whenever this character quests, you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

characters.name: Helga Sinclair
characters.subtitle: Vengeful Partner
characters.author: Kasia Brzezinska
characters.flavor_text: You said we were in this together!
characters.rules_text: NOTHING PERSONAL When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

characters.name: Jetsam
characters.subtitle: Riffraff
characters.author: Brian Kesinger
characters.flavor_text: There must be powerful lore here, very powerful.
characters.rules_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) EERIE PAIR Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.

characters.name: Kit Cloudkicker
characters.subtitle: Tough Guy
characters.author: Jake Parker
characters.flavor_text: It’s been fun, guys, but I got to be going. Yahoooo!
characters.rules_text: SKYSURFING When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2 or less to their player's hand.

characters.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke
characters.subtitle: Cunning Mercenary
characters.author: Mike Parker
characters.rules_text: WELL, NOW YOU KNOW When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.) THANKS FOR VOLUNTEERING Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

characters.name: Milo Thatch
characters.subtitle: Clever Cartographer
characters.author: Giuseppe di Maio
characters.flavor_text: Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!

characters.name: Milo Thatch
characters.subtitle: King of Atlantis
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: You don’t know what you’re tampering with.
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.) TAKE THEM BY SURPRISE When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their players’ hands.

characters.name: Morph
characters.subtitle: Space Goo
characters.author: Alan Batson
characters.flavor_text: You jiggle-headed blob of mischief! —John Silver
characters.rules_text: MIMICRY You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

characters.name: Peter Pan
characters.subtitle: Lost Boy Leader
characters.author: Grace Tran

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a Peter Pan – Lost Boy Leader at The Queen’s Castle – Mirror Chamber, which has 2 {L}. If I move Peter Pan to De Vil Manor – Cruella’s Estate, which has 1 {L}, and then move him back to The Queen’s Castle, can I use his I Came to Listen to the Stories ability to gain 2 lore?
A: No. You must use Peter Pan – Lost Boy Leader’s ability I Came to Listen to the Stories the first time he moves to a location each turn. If he hasn’t moved on your turn and you move him to De Vil Manor, you gain 1 lore. You can’t use his I Came to Listen to the Stories ability again that turn.

characters.flavor_text: The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer.
characters.rules_text: I CAME TO LISTEN TO THE STORIES Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's.

characters.name: Prince John
characters.subtitle: Phony King
characters.author: Koni

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I have 10 lore and my opponent has 12 lore. If I quest with my Prince John – Phony King, who has 2 {L}, can I use his Collect Taxes ability to make my opponent lose 2 lore?
A: No. When a character quests, they immediately gain lore equal to their {L}. This means that in order to use Prince John – Phony King’s ability Collect Taxes to have an opponent lose lore, they must have more lore than you after you’ve gained the 2 lore from Prince John’s quest.

characters.flavor_text: Too late to be known as John the First, he's sure to be known as John the Worst! —Sheriff of Nottingham
characters.rules_text: COLLECT TAXES Whenever this character quests, each opponent with more lore than you loses 2 lore.

characters.name: Robin Hood
characters.subtitle: Daydreamer
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: Some days, it's nice to let the river do the running.

characters.name: Shenzi
characters.subtitle: Hyena Pack Leader
characters.author: Jochem van Gool
characters.flavor_text: Why not stick around for dinner?

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: When can I play the additional song using Ursula – Deceiver of All’s ability What a Deal?
A: When using the What a Deal ability of Ursula – Deceiver of  All, you must play the song immediately after you played it the first time. You can’t wait until later in the turn.

Q: The only character in play is my Ursula – Deceiver of All, who currently has 1 damage. If I have Ursula sing Let the Storm Rage On, can I use her What a Deal ability to play it again?
A: Yes. When you play Let the Storm Rage On, if there’s a character in play you can choose to deal 2 damage to, you must do so. Even if Let the Storm Rage on banishes your Ursula – Deceiver of All, you can still use her What a Deal ability. In this case you won’t be able to deal 2 damage to a character, as there aren’t any in play, but you still draw a card.

Q: My Ursula – Deceiver of All sings The Boss is On a Roll. I choose to place 4 cards on top of my deck and 1 card on the bottom. If I use her What a Deal ability to play The Boss is On a Roll again and choose to put 1 more card on the bottom of my deck, where does my copy of The Boss is On a Roll go in relation to the other cards I placed on the bottom of my deck?
A: The Boss is On a Roll will be the bottom-most card of your deck, regardless of how many cards you put on the bottom of your deck each time you played it. The card played a second time with Ursula – Deceiver of All’s ability What a Deal is placed on the bottom of your deck after its effect has finished.

characters.flavor_text: I don't want much—just the most powerful lore!
characters.rules_text: WHAT A DEAL Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free. If you do, put that card on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard.

Q: I have a ready Alice – Growing Girl and Moana – Born Leader at the same location. If Moana quests while Alice is ready, will Alice be able to quest this turn?
A: No. Moana – Born Leader’s ability Welcome to My Boat is mandatory and affects all other characters at the location she’s at. Even if Alice – Growing Girl is ready when Moana quests, Alice won’t be able to quest later this turn. Note that Alice still won’t be able to quest this turn even if she moves to a different location or the location she and Moana are at is removed from play.

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: My opponent plays Let It Go and chooses my Gramma Tala – Spirit of the Ocean to put into my inkwell. Do I gain lore from her ability Do You Know Who You Are?
A: No. You can only use Gramma Tala – Spirit of the Ocean’s Do You Know Who You Are? ability if she’s in play when a card is put into your inkwell. When a character in play is put into a player’s inkwell, the character first leaves play and then is put into the inkwell. This means Gramma Tala isn’t in play to see a card being put into your inkwell, so you can’t use her ability. Note that this is still the case if Gramma Tala was shifted and there’s a card underneath her.

characters.flavor_text: She will always be with you, no matter how far your journey takes you.
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.) DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE? Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse

SKILLED COMBATANT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore. THE GOOD OF OTHERS When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

characters.subtitle: Rock Star
characters.author: Nicholas Kole

characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) ADORING FANS Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

characters.name: Scrooge McDuck
characters.subtitle: Uncle Moneybags
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi

characters.rules_text: TREASURE FINDER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 less for the next item you play this turn.

characters.name: Ursula

characters.author: Lisanne Koeteeuw
characters.rules_text: YOU'LL NEVER EVEN MISS IT When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: Life is sweeter with friends.

additional_info.body:

A: Yes, it can.

characters.flavor_text: Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand? —Christopher Robin

characters.rules_text: There's Trouble A-Brewin'\ Your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +1.

characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: You couldn't pick a better friend.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: King Louie
characters.subtitle: Jungle VIP
characters.author: Hadjie Joos

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: My King Louie- Jungle VIP has 6 damage on it. I use my King Louie to challenge a 2 strength character of my opponent’s. If King Louie banishes the opposing character in the challenge can I use his ability before he would be banished because of the challenge?

A: No, you cannot. Both characters involved in a challenge receive damage at the same time and are also banished due to taking damage equal to or greater than their willpower at the same time if applicable. This means that at the time King Louie’s ability is able to trigger he would already be banished and therefore no longer in play. Note that this does not change if King Louie is the character being challenged instead.

characters.flavor_text: Cool it, boy. Unwind yourself.
characters.rules_text: LAY IT ON THE LINE Whenever another character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Friendly Face
characters.author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: Come on in—there’s lots to explore.
characters.rules_text: GLAD YOU'RE HERE! Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 less for the next character you play this turn.

characters.name: Mufasa
characters.subtitle: Betrayed Leader
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: My Mufasa- Betrayed Leader is banished and I use his The Sun Will Set ability. The card on top of my deck when the ability is used is an action card. When I return that card to the deck does it return face up or face down?

A: Face down. All cards in the deck are face down at all times unless otherwise specified.

characters.rules_text: THE SUN WILL SET When this character is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Free Spirit
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.flavor_text: Everything looks better when you’re free to be yourself.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Reflecting
characters.author: Lissette Carrera

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: I quest with my Mulan- Reflecting and use her Honor to the Ancestors ability. The card on the top of my deck is a copy of Be Prepared and I chose not to play that card. What happens to the card in this case?

A: The card is returned to the top of your deck. Even if the card is a song card as long as you choose not to play it then the card is returned to the top of your deck, face down.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) HONOR TO THE ANCESTORS Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Nana
characters.subtitle: Darling Family Pet
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: Children are a dog’s best friend.

characters.name: Piglet

characters.author: Kiersten Hale
characters.flavor_text: For a very small animal, he has an awfully big heart.

characters.subtitle: Gifted Artist
characters.author: Aubrey Archer

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: Three of my characters have 2 damage each on them. If my Rapunzel- Gifted Artist sings Hakuna Matata in that situation, how many cards can I draw with her Let Your Power Shine ability?

A: 3 cards. Rapunzel- Gifted Artist’s ability triggers for each individual character of yours that has damage removed from them regardless of how much damage is removed from that character.

characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Rapunzel.) LET YOUR POWER SHINE Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: Sunshine
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: We can all make the world a little brighter in our own way.
characters.rules_text: MAGIC HAIR — Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.flavor_text: He never gets tired of naps.

characters.flavor_text: Look out! He’s gonna blow!
characters.rules_text: Ah-choo!\ Whenever you play this character or another Seven Dwarfs character, you may give chosen character -1 this turn.

characters.author: LadyShalirin
characters.flavor_text: Why, you’re all alone, just like me.

characters.rules_text: How Do You Do?\ You pay 1 less to play Seven Dwarfs characters.

characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Snow White.) WISHES COME TRUE Whenever this character quests, you may return a character card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Commanding Presence
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies / LadyShalirin

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a The Queen- Commanding Presence and a Flounder- Voice of Reason in play. My opponent has a Mickey Mouse- True Friend and a Maleficent- Sorceress. In this situation if I quest with my The Queen- Commanding Presence and use her Who is the Fairest? Ability, what characters can I choose for each part of her effect?

A: When using the Who is the Fairest? Ability of The Queen- Commanding Presence you must choose an opponent’s character to receive -4 strength. This means that you can only choose either Mickey Mouse or Maleficent to receive -4 strength in this example. When using the second part of the Who is the Fairest? Ability you may choose any character to receive +4 strength. In this example you may choose Mickey Mouse, Maleficent, The Queen or Flounder to receive +4 strength. Note that you must choose a character for each part of the ability so you are not able to decrease the strength of a character and not increase the strength of a character.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.) WHO IS THE FAIREST? Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -4 this turn and chosen character gets +4 this turn.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Regal Monarch
characters.author: Eva Widermann
characters.flavor_text: Don’t question her. Don’t doubt her. And above all, don’t disobey her.

characters.subtitle: Wizard's Apprentice

characters.rules_text: STUDENT Whenever this character quests, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to gain 2 lore.

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I quest my Fairy Godmother- Mystic Armorer and use her “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability and then play a Maui- Hero to All and challenge with that Maui, does he gain the Challenger +3 and “When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand” abilities from the “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability?

A: Characters played after you use the “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability will not gain Challenger +3 and “When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand”. Only characters in play when you quest with Fairy godmother gain the ability.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Fairy Godmother.) FORGET THE COACH, HERE'S A SWORD Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Challenger +3 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +3 while challenging.)

characters.subtitle: Pure Heart
characters.author: Matt Chapman
characters.flavor_text: We’ll have to hurry, because even miracles take a little time.
characters.rules_text: JUST LEAVE IT TO ME Whenever you play a character named Cinderella, you may exert chosen character.

characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: CHASING THE RABBIT When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand. Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) I WIN, I WIN! When you play this character, banish her or return another 2 chosen characters of yours to your hand.

A: No, you do not.

characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Madam Mim.) GRUESOME AND GRIM — Play a character with cost 4 or less for free. They gain Rush. At the end of the turn, banish them. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: I’ve got you rattled now!
characters.rules_text: JUST YOU WAIT When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.

characters.rules_text: READY OR NOT! When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 while challenging.)

characters.rules_text: HERE I COME! When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.

additional_info.body:
Q: If Merlin is chosen by the effect of Let it Go and placed into my inkwell does his ability trigger?

characters.flavor_text: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.
characters.rules_text: HOPPITY HIP! When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.

characters.subtitle: Shapeshifter
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.flavor_text: Oh, blast it all—I can’t make up my mind.
characters.rules_text: BATTLE OF WITS Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 this turn.

characters.flavor_text: You can’t always trust to luck, boy.
characters.rules_text: LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Peter Pan's Shadow
characters.subtitle: Not Sewn On
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) TIPTOE Your other characters with Rush gain Evasive.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Star Attraction
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: With that personality, that profile, that physique... Why, I can see your name in lights, lights six feet high. —Honest John

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: On the Run
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: He raced into the Inklands without a thought.
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Pinocchio.) LISTEN TO YOUR CONSCIENCE When you play this character, you may return chosen character or item with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Talkative Puppet
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.flavor_text: A lie keeps growing and growing until it’s as plain as the nose on your face. —Blue Fairy
characters.rules_text: TELLING LIES When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Winnie the Pooh
characters.subtitle: Hunny Wizard
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: He’d always felt a kinship with honey. They were both golden, and sweet, and likely to end up in sticky situations.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Scary Beyond All Reason
characters.author: Casey Robin

additional_info.title: Errata
additional_info.body:
Errata: The Cruel Irony ability was printed with an error. The printed version of Yzma-Scary Beyond All Reason’s Cruel Irony ability is as follows:
When you play this character, you may shuffle another chosen character into their player’s deck. That player draws 2 cards.

characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.) CRUEL IRONY When you play this character, shuffle another chosen character card into their player’s deck. That player draws 2 cards.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Without Beauty Sleep
characters.author: Pablo Hidalgo
characters.flavor_text: Yzma: Llamas! All I see when I close my eyes is llamas!%Kronk: Weird. I just saw one in the flood. Poor little guy.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Trained Swordsman
characters.author: Mario Oscar Gabriele
characters.flavor_text: It’s not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade. —Merlin

characters.name: Beast
characters.subtitle: Relentless
characters.author: Eri Welli

additional_info.title: FAQ 3
additional_info.body:
Q: My opponent has a copy of Flounder and 4 copies of Mouse Armor in play. On my opponent’s turn they used the Protection ability of all 4 copies of Mouse Armor and chose Flounder all 4 times, giving it Resist 4. In this situation if my Beast- Relentless challenges that opposing Flounder, can I use Beast’s Second Wind ability to ready him?

A: No, you cannot. If  a character with resist 4 is dealt 4 damage then all 4 damage is prevented by resist and therefore that character was not damaged.

characters.rules_text: SECOND WIND Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Bookworm
characters.author: Jenna Gray
characters.flavor_text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.
characters.rules_text: USE YOUR IMAGINATION While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Hidden Archer
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.flavor_text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.

Starting August 9th, 2024, Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor, will be changed as follows:

Cost: 2 --> 3
Keyword: Ward --> No keyword ability
Updated ability: \Squeak\ Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card. --> Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.author: E. Meleranci / L. Giammichele

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I am playing a 4 player game and one of my opponent’s has 2 cards in hand, another has 1 card in hand and my last opponent has no cards in hand, how much lore will my Flynn Rider- His Own Biggest fan have?

A: Flynn Rider will have 1 lore. Flynn loses one card for each card in every opponent’s hand, so adding the two cards in one of your opponent's hands together with the one in the other’s hand he will lose a total of 3 lore and have just 1 left.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ONE LAST, BIG SCORE This character gets -1 for each card in your opponents' hands.

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: If my opponent plays a Lucifer- Cunning Cat and I have only 1 card in my hand which is a character card do I have to discard it?

A: Yes. If you do not have an action card in hand when Lucifer- Cunning Cat is played you must choose to discard 2 cards. When you choose to discard more cards than you have left in hand you must discard as many cards as you can.

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a Prince John - Greediest of All in play and play a You Have Forgotten Me, causing my opponent to discard 2 cards. Can I choose to draw only 1 card with Prince John’s I Sentence You ability?

A: No, you cannot. When choosing to draw with Prince John’s I Sentence You ability you must draw equal to the number discarded. So in this example you would either draw 2 cards if you used the I Sentence You ability or 0 if you choose not to use it.

characters.flavor_text: Taxes! Taxes! Beautiful, lovely taxes!

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: When I play Lady Tremaine- Imperious Queen and use her Power to Rule at Last ability my opponent has a Lilo- Making a Wish and a Prince John- Greediest of All in play. When choosing which character to banish with the Power to Rule at last ability what characters can be chosen?

A: Even though Lady Tremaine is your character your opponent chooses which character to banish with her effect. This means that despite Prince John’s ward he can be chosen to be banished by the effect and therefore your opponent can choose either of their characters to banish for the Power to Rule at Last ability.

characters.flavor_text: The twelfth Rule of Villainy: If you don't have a throne, take one.

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: I control a Minnie Mouse- Wide-Eyed Diver that has been in play for an entire turn. I play two actions and due to her Undersea Adventure ability she gains +2 lore. If I shift a second copy of Minnie Mouse Wide-Eyed Diver onto the first copy of Minnie Mouse- Wide-Eyed Diver. How much lore would that new Wide-Eyed Diver have?

A: 3 lore. It has 1 lore base and has gained 2 lore from the ability of the first copy of Wide-Eyed Diver’s Undersea Adventure ability. The lore gained from that ability remains even if the character shifts. The ability of the second copy of Wide-Eyed Diver does not add to it’s total lore because it was not in play when you played your second action so it’s ability does not trigger.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) UNDERSEA ADVENTURE Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 this turn.
